attack order.descEffects: The user calls out a swarm of insects to pummel the target. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

bug bite.descEffects: The user bites at the target. On a hit, if the target is wielding a Berry, the user eats and gains the effect of that Berry.

fell stinger.descEffects: The user lashes outward with a stinger. If the target is Fainted with this Move, the user's Attack increases by +6 Stages.

first impression.descEffects: The user surprises the target with a quick attack. This Move can only be used on the first Turn that the user is in Battle.

fury cutter.descEffects: The user does a physical slice at their enemy. Each successive time the user hits and enemy with this Move, it deals an additional Minor Wound for each hit beyond the first.

leech life.descEffects: The user strikes the target, draining them of their energy and regaining an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

lunge.descEffects: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. The target's Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

megahorn.descEffects: The user brutally strikes the target with their horn.

pin missile.descEffects: The user fires hardened needles at 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

pounce.descEffects: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

skitter smack.descEffects: The user skitters behind the target and strikes at them. The target's Sp. Atk may lower by -2 Stages.

steamroller.descEffects: The user picks a point within range and barrels through it, rolling over each creature between them and the point. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

twinneedle.descEffects: The user jabs at up to two targets with a stinger. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

u-turn.descEffects: The user strikes the target, then the user immediately Swaps with another creature in their Party. If there are no other creatures to Swap with, this effect fails. If this Move is used against a Wild Pokemon, the user instead Flees.

x-scissor.descEffects: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

bug buzz.descEffects: The user vibrates their body to create a high-frequency vibration. Creatures hit by this Move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

infestation.descEffects: The user sends out waves of small insects, ensuring their enemies. Creatures hit by this Move are Bound for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

signal beam.descEffects: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. Creatures hit by this Move may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

silver wind.descEffects: The user flaps their wings and sends a powdery wind towards their enemies. There is a 25% chance that this Move increases all of the user's Stats by +2 Stages.

struggle bug.descEffects: The user writhes, releasing Bug-Type energy that assaults only enemy creatures in range. Creatures hit by this move have their Sp. Atk lowered by -2 Stages.

defend order.descEffects: The user calls out a swarm of insects to create a living shield around themself. The user's Defense and Sp. Defense increase by +2 Stages.

heal order.descEffects: The user calls out a swarm of insects to treat their injuries and regains 5 Wounds.

pollen puff.descEffects: The user releases a puff of pollen that harms enemies and heals allies. If an ally is hit by this Move, they regain 3 Wounds instead of taking damage.

powder.descEffects: The user covers all creatures in its range with a fine powder that has explosive potential. Until the end of the Round, if a creature hit by this Move uses a Fire-Type Moves, they fail to use the Move and instead take 3 Wounds.

quiver dance.descEffects: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. The user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense, and Speed all increase by +2 Stages.

rage powder.descEffects: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Creatures hit by this Move must target only the user with attacks until the end of the Round or until the user leaves Battle.

silk trap.descEffects: The user spins a silken trap around themself. Until the end of the Round, if the user would be hit by a Physical or Special Move, it takes no damage and suffers no effects from those Moves. If a Contact Move would hit the user but is blocked by this Move, the attacking creature's Speed lowers by -2 Stages. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

spider web.descEffects: The user sprays the target with thin gooey webbing that prevents them from escaping. The target cannot leave Battle without Fainting or by the use of a Move, Ability, or Item. This Move does not affect Ghost-Type Pokemon.

sticky web.descEffects: The user leaves a sticky net around the field. When an enemy creature enters Battle while the web is present, their Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

string shot.descEffects: The user fires a thick and stringy substance at the target, which lowers the target's Speed by -4 Stages.

tail glow.descEffects: The user flashes with in light as they gather energy. The user's Sp. Atk increases by +4 Stages.

assurance.descEffects: The user strikes the target with an attack full of dark-infused energy. If the target has already taken Wounds this Turn, this Move deals twice the number of Wounds.

beat up.descEffects: The user channels their power and the power of their allies to attack the target. This Move hits a number of times equal to the number of creatures in the user's Party, including themself, and it must hit the same target.

bite.descEffects: The user strikes the target with their vicious fangs. On a hit, this Move may cause the target to Flinch.

brutal swing.descEffects: The user violently flails its body to attack.

ceaseless edge.descEffects: The user slashes the target with a shell blade, leaving splinters of shell across the Battlefield. When this Move hits, the user immediately uses Spikes, requiring no action.

comeuppance.descEffects: The user retaliates and strikes a creature that has damaged it this Round. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to the most damage that the user received from the target from a single Move + 2 Wounds. If the user targets a creature that has not used a Physical or Special Move on them this Round, then this Move fails. If this creature has not been hit by a Physical or Special Move this Round, this Move cannot be used.

crunch.descEffects: The user grasps the target in their fangs, and violently crunches down. The attack may lower the target's Defense by -2 Stages.

darkest lariat.descEffects: The user swings both arms down and hits the target. When making a defending roll for this Move, the target does not add their Defense Stages to the roll.

false surrender.descEffects: The user pretends to bow their head, but then stabs at the target.

feint attack.descEffects: The user draws up to target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch.

fling.descEffects: The user throws its Held Item at the target. This Move fails if the user does not have a Held Item.

foul play.descEffects: The user tricks the target into attacking themselves. When making the attacking roll for this Move, use the target's Attack Die for the roll, rather than the user's.

hyperspace fury.descEffects: The user unleases a barrage of attacks that bypass the defenses of nearby creatures. The user's Defense lowers by -2 Stages. This Move will still hit a creature through the effects of defensive Moves and removes those effects from the Battlefield. The following are considered defensive moves: Protect, Detect, Spiky Shield, King's Shield, Mat Block, Baneful Bunker, Quick Guard, Wide Guard, Crafty Shield, and Substitute.

jaw lock.descEffects: The user bites down hard on the target. Both creatures' Movement Speed becomes 0, and they cannot be Swapped or Returned until one of them has Fainted or the Battle Ends.

knock off.descEffects: The user strike the target harshly. If the target is holding an Item, this attack deals an additional 2 Wounds, and the target's Item is knocked away from them and infused with Dark energy, making it unusable for the rest of the battle.

kowtow cleave.descEffects: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard.

lash out.descEffects: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If any of the target's Stages have been lowered this Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

night slash.descEffects: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

payback.descEffects: The user stores power, then attacks. If the target has a higher Turn Order than the user, this Move deals twice the number of Wounds.

power trip.descEffects: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. This Move deals an additional number of Wounds equal to the half of the sum of their Stages, rounded down (minimum 0).

punishment.descEffects: The user increases their strength based on their target and attacks. This Move deals an additional number of Wounds equal to the half of the sum of the target's Stages, rounded down (minimum 0).

pursuit.descEffects: The user strikes out at the target with dark-infused energy. If a creature within range of the user would Swap or Return, and the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. If the target is hit while this Move is being used this way, this Move deals twice the number of Wounds.

sucker punch.descEffects: The user goes for a quick punch the brutally punishes attackers. If a creature within range uses a Physical or Special Move and the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. This Move cannot be used without fulfilling this condition.

thief.descEffects: The user attacks the target with dark intent. A target hit by this Move has their Held Item stolen, if the user is not already holding an Item.

throat chop.descEffects: The user attacks the target's throat. Until the end of the next Round, the target cannot use sound-based Moves. The following are sound-based moves: https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Sound-based_move

wicked blow.descEffects: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target.

wicked torque.descEffects: The user increases their inner torque and spins around to attack. Creatures hit by this Move may fall Asleep.

baddy bad.descEffects: The user pulses dark energy at the target. After this Move hits, the energy from it congeals into a shield as though the user just used Reflect.

dark pulse.descEffects: The user releases a horrible aura of dark-infused energy. Creatures hit with this Move may Flinch.

fiery wrath.descEffects: The user transforms their wrath into a fiery aura that damages each enemy creature on the battlefield. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

night daze.descEffects: The user lets loose a pitch black shockwave. Creatures hit by this Move are Blinded until they leave Battle.

ruination.descEffects: The user summons a disaster that harms all enemy creatures on the field. Creatures hit by this Move take damage equal to half their remaining Wounds, rounded down (minimum 1). This Move does not deal additional Wounds through S.T.A.B., vulnerability, Abilities, Items, or other Moves. This Move cannot land a Critical Hit.

snarl.descEffects: The user yells as if ranting, releasing dark-type energy and targeting only enemy creatures. Creatures hit by this Move has their Sp. Attack reduced by -2 Stages.

dark void.descEffects: The user creates a brief world of total darkness only targets enemy creatures. Creatures hit by this move fall Asleep.

embargo.descEffects: The user manipulates dark-infused energy to prevent the target from being the user or target of Items. The target cannot benefit from or use its Held Items, and no Items may be used on it by its trainer or other sources. This effect lasts 5 Rounds or until the target leaves Battle.

fake tears.descEffects: The user feigns crying to fluster all enemy creatures. Creatures hit by this move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -4 Stages.

flatter.descEffects: The user uses flattery to Confuse the target. The target's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

hone claws.descEffects: The user sharpens its claws to increase its Attack by +2 Stages.

memento.descEffects: The user sacrifices their life-force to leave the target with a lasting memento. When this Move hits, the user Faints. The target's Attack and Sp. Attack lower by -6 Stages.

nasty plot.descEffects: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. The user's Sp. Attack increases by +4 Stages.

obstruct.descEffects: The user protects themself from all Physical and Special Moves that target them until the end of the round. If this Move blocks a Contact Move this way, the attacking creature's Defense lowers by -4 Stages. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

parting shot.descEffects: The user threatens the target and then escapes. The target's Attack and Sp. Attack lower by -2 Stages. When this Move hits, if the target's Stages were successfully lowered and there is a creature to Swap with, the user Swaps with another creature in the user's party.

quash.descEffects: The user sprays forth a harsh acid. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned. If a creature is Poisoned this way, their Defense is reduced by -2 Stages.

snatch.descEffects: The user prepares themselves to snatch away the potential of their foes. Until the end of the turn, if a creature within range would use a Status Move with a targeting type of Self, their Move fails and the user of this Move uses that Move instead.

taunt.descEffects: The user taunts the target into a rage that prevents them from using Status Moves for 3 Rounds or until they leave Battle.

topsy-turvy.descEffects: The user flips the target's Stages. All of the target's Stage changes invert, changing positive to negative and vice versa. If this Move targets an ally or the user, it does not require a roll to hit.

torment.descEffects: The user uses dark-type energy to enrage the target. They cannot use the same Move twice in a row until the leave Battle.

breaking swipe.descEffects: The user swings its tail wildly to attack. Creatures hit by this Move have their Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

dragon claw.descEffects: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws imbued with dragon-type energy.

dragon darts.descEffects: The user summons a small dragons to strike up to two different targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

dragon hammer.descEffects: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack.

dragon rush.descEffects: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target Flinch. If the target has used Minimize, this Move hits without fail, requiring no roll, and deals twice the number of Wounds.

dragon tail.descEffects: The user knocks the target away and forces it to Swap. If there are no creatures to Swap with, this effect fails. If the Move is used on a Wild Pokemon, that Pokemon Flees.

dual chop.descEffects: The user attacks by hitting up to two targets with brutal strikes. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

glaive chop.descEffects: The user recklessly launches themself like a glaive at a point this Move's range, requiring no movement, and strikes each creature in that line. The user lands at the end of this Move's range or until this strike a solid surface, like a wall or stone. Until the beginning of the user's next Turn, all Physical and Special Moves that target the user hit without fail, requiring no rolls, and deal twice as many Wounds.

order up.descEffects: The user attacks with an elegant pose. If the user has a Tatsuguri in their mouth from the Commander ability, they increase one of their Stats by +2 Stages depending on the Tatsugiri's form: Curly (Attack), Droopy (Defense), and Stretchy (Speed)

outrage.descEffects: The user rampages and attacks for 1d4 - 1 Rounds (minimum 1). Once it has attacked for the final time, the user becomes Confused for 1d4 +1 Rounds. If this move is interrupted due to the user being unable to attack, it ends early and the user is not confused.

scale shot.descEffects: The user shoots scales at 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities. If this Move hits, the user increases their Speed by +2 Stages and lowers their Defense by -2 Stages. This additional effect only triggers once per use of this Move.

clanging scales.descEffects: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge sonic attack. The users Defense lowers by -2 Stages.

core enforcer.descEffects: The user fires a beam of brilliant green light. If a creature hit by this Move has already taken its Turn this Round, they lose their Ability until the leave Battle.

draco meteor.descEffects: The user fires draconic energy into the air and has it rain down as comets in a 3 Sq. radius area within range. The user's Sp. Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

dragon breath.descEffects: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. Creatures hit by this Move may also be Paralyzed.

dragon pulse.descEffects: The user attacks with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

dragon rage.descEffects: The user releases a shock wave of pure rage. This Move always deals 2 Wounds, ignoring S.T.A.B., Resistances, Weaknesses, Items, and Abilities.

dynamax cannon.descEffects: The user release a beam of Dynamax Energy. If the user is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

eternabeam.descEffects: The user releases a beam of pure energy. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

fickle beam.descEffects: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. There is a 30% chance that this Move will deal twice as many Wounds.

roar of time.descEffects: The user releases a time-distorting blast of power. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

spacial rend.descEffects: The user tears at the fabric the space around them. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

twister.descEffects: The user creates a massive funnel of wind that affects the entire Field. Creatures hit by this Move may Flinch.

clangorous soul.descEffects: The user performs a loud scale-dance, harming themself but raising their power. The user takes 3 Wounds. The user's Stats all increase by +2 Stages.

dragon cheer.descEffects: The user cheers on their allies morale with a draconic cry. Ally creatures within range has lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending rolls to Critically Hit by 3 until they leave Battle. If the ally is a Dragon-Type, it instead lowers the amount by 6.

dragon dance.descEffects: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that increases its Attack and Speed by +2 Stages.

aura wheel.descEffects: The user releases its stored energy and attacks. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this Move is Dark-Type instead of Electric Type.

bolt beak.descEffects: The user stabs at the target with an electrified beak. If the target has not yet taken their Turn, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

bolt strike.descEffects: The user charges at its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. The target may be Paralyzed.

double shock.descEffects: The user discharges all the electricity in their body into a single strike against the target. If the user is Electric-Type, it loses its Electric-Typing until it leaves Battle.

fusion bolt.descEffects: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. If the Move most recently used was Fusion Flare, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

nuzzle.descEffects: The user attacks by nuzzling its cheeks against the target. This Move may Paralyze the target.

plasma fists.descEffects: The user attacks with electrically charged fists that electrifies the air. Until the end of the Round, all Normal-Type Moves become Electric-Type Moves.

spark.descEffects: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This Move may Paralyze the target.

supercell slam.descEffects: The user electrifies their body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this Move misses, the user takes 3 Wounds of damage.

thunder fang.descEffects: The user bites with electrified fangs. The target may be Paralyzed and/or Flinched.

thunder punch.descEffects: The user electrifies their fist and punches the target. This Move may Paralyze the target.

volt tackle.descEffects: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This attack deals Recoil and may Paralyze the target.

wild charge.descEffects: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. The user also takes Recoil damage.

zing zap.descEffects: The user sends a strong electric blast crashing down on the target. The target may be Flinched.

zippy zap.descEffects: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target.

buzzy buzz.descEffects: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. The target is Paralyzed.

charge beam.descEffects: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. The user's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

discharge.descEffects: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

electro ball.descEffects: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to the difference between the size of the user's Speed Die Size minus the target's Speed Die Size (minimum of 1). For example, if the user has a d20 Speed Die Size (Size 6), and the target's is a d4 (Size 1), this Move deals 6 - 1 = 5 Wounds.

electro drift.descEffects: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This Move deals an additional 1 Wound if the target is vulnerable to it.

electro shot.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. On the first turn, the user gathers energy and their Sp. Attack increase by +2 Stages. On the second Turn, the user releases a high-voltage beam. If the user is unable to use their second turn to attack due to being interrupted (such as by being Asleep, Frozen, or Flinched), the user will still attack at full power on the next available turn, no additional PP required.

electroweb.descEffects: The user attacks and captures the target with an electric net. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

overdrive.descEffects: The user creates a huge echo and a strong vibration.

parabolic charge.descEffects: The user creates a electrical bond with all enemy creatures in range, damaging them and healing itself. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

pika papow.descEffects: The user releases a bolt of electricity that grows more powerful the more it likes its trainer. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to half of its Friendship Points, rounded up (minimum 1).

rising voltage.descEffects: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. When an Electric Terrain is active, this Move deals twice the number of Wounds.

shock wave.descEffects: The user strikes with an indiscriminate jolt of electricity.

thunder.descEffects: The user brings down a wicked thunderbolt at a point within range, striking all creatures within a 3 Sq. radius of the bolt. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

thunder cage.descEffects: The user traps the target in a cage of electricity. The target is Bound for 1d4 + 1 Turns.

thunder shock.descEffects: The user hurls a jolt of electricity at a spot on the ground within range, striking each creature within 2 Sq. of that point. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

thunderbolt.descEffects: The user sends a strong electric blast crashing down at the target. This Move may Paralyze the target.

thunderclap.descEffects: The user sends out a preemptive bolt of electricity at the target. If a creature within range uses a Physical or Special Move and the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. This Move cannot be used without fulfilling this condition.

volt switch.descEffects: The user strikes the target with blast of electricity, and then they Swap. If there are no other creatures in their party to Swap with, this effect fails.

wildbolt storm.descEffects: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

zap cannon.descEffects: The user fires an electrical blast like a cannon. Creatures hit by this move are Paralyzed.

charge.descEffects: The user stores energy within themselves. The user's Sp. Defense increases by +2 Stages. During the next Round, if the next Move that they use is Electric-Type, that Move deals twice as many Wounds.

eerie impulse.descEffects: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. The target's Sp. Defense lowers by -4 Stages.

electric terrain.descEffects: The user electrifies the ground under their feet and creates an Electric Terrain for 5 Rounds.

electrify.descEffects: The user electrifies the target, changing their energy type. Until the end of the Round, Moves used by the target become Electric-Type. If this Move targets a creature that has already taken its Turn this Round, this Move fails.

ion deluge.descEffects: The user disperses electrically charged particles. Until the end of the Round, all Normal-Type Moves become Electric-Type Moves.

magnet rise.descEffects: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism. For 5 Rounds, the user gains a levitating movement speed and becomes immune to Ground-Type Moves and Hazard Moves.

magnetic flux.descEffects: The user manipulates magnetic fields to empower its allies. All ally creatures with the Plus or Minus ability, including the user, have their HP, Defense and Sp. Defense increased by +2 Stages.

thunder wave.descEffects: The user releases a burst of weak electrical energy that can cause muscles to seize. Creatures hit by this Move are Paralyzed.

magical torque.descEffects: The user increases their inner torque and spins around. Creatures hit by this Move may become Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

play rough.descEffects: The user plays rough with the target, smacking them around. This may lower the target's Attack by -2 Stages.

spirit break.descEffects: The user attacks the target with so much force that they break their spirit. The targets Sp. Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

alluring voice.descEffects: The user attacks using its angelic voice. If a creature hit by this Move has had its Stages increased this Round, it becomes Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

dazzling gleam.descEffects: The user emits a powerful damaging flash.

disarming voice.descEffects: The user of this Move lets out a charming cry that deals emotional damage to enemy creatures.

draining kiss.descEffects: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss, regaining an amount of Wounds equal to three-quarters the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

fairy wind.descEffects: The user stirs up a mystical wind and strikes with it.

fleur cannon.descEffects: The user unleashes a strong beam, sacrificing some of its own power. The user's Sp. Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

light of ruin.descEffects: The user draws in power and fires a powerful beam of light. The user also takes Recoil damage for the creature that took the most amount of damage from this Move.

misty explosion.descEffects: The user sacrifices their life force to create a powerful explosion. When a Misty Terrain is active, this Move deals an additional two Wounds.

moonblast.descEffects: The user hurls a beam of moon energy at a 2 Sq. radius point within range. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

nature's madness.descEffects: The user strikes with the force of nature. The target takes damage equal to half their remaining Wounds, rounded down (minimum 1). This Move does not deal additional Wounds through S.T.A.B., vulnerability, Abilities, Items, or other Moves. This Move cannot land a Critical Hit.

sparkly swirl.descEffects: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. The user, their allies, and all creatures in the user's party are healed of Status Conditions.

springtide storm.descEffects: The user creates fierce winds filled with love and hate that only target enemy creatures on the field. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

strange steam.descEffects: The user attacks by emitting pink steam. Creatures hit by this Move may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

aromatic mist.descEffects: The user targets an ally with a mysterious aroma. The target's Sp.Def increases by +2 Stages.

baby-doll eyes.descEffects: The user stares at a target that can see them with its baby-doll eyes. The target's Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

charm.descEffects: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

crafty shield.descEffects: The user protects itself and its allies with mysterious power. Until the end of the turn, the user and creatures friendly to the user are not affected by Status Moves used by enemy creatures.

decorate.descEffects: The user covers an ally with fun decorations. The target's Attack and Sp. Attack increase by +4 Stages.

fairy lock.descEffects: The user magically locks down the battlefield. Creatures cannot Swap or Flee without the use of an Ability, Item, or Move until the beginning of the user's next Turn.

floral healing.descEffects: The user bombards an ally with natural energy. The target regains 3 Wounds. When a Grassy Terrain is active, the target instead regains 6 Wounds.

flower shield.descEffects: The user fortifies the abilities of all Grass-Type Pokemon in Battle (including itself, if it is a Grass-Type). Grass-Type Pokemon increase their Defense by +2 Stages.

geomancy.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user absorbs mystical energy. On the second Turn, the user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Def, and Speed increase by +4 Stages.

misty terrain.descEffects: The user covers the ground in pink mist and creates a Misty Terrain for 5 Rounds.

moonlight.descEffects: The user absorbs ambient moonlight in the air, healing themself. The user regains 4 Wounds. If the Weather is Harsh Sunlight, the user instead regains 6 Wounds. If the Weather is not clear or Harsh Sunlight, they instead regain 2 Wounds.

sweet kiss.descEffects: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that Confuses the target for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

arm thrust.descEffects: The user sends straight-arm punches at 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

axe kick.descEffects: The user kicks into the air and slams down their heel on the target. The target may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. If this Move misses, the user takes 3 Wounds of damage.

body press.descEffects: The user slams their body into the target. When making the attacking roll for this Move, use the user's Defense Die for the roll, rather than the user's Attack Die.

brick break.descEffects: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. Before calculating damage, this move ends all barriers from the target's side of the field, such a Aurora Veil, Light Screen, and Reflect.

circle throw.descEffects: The user throws the target and forced to Swap. If there are no creatures to Swap with, this effect fails. If the Move is used on a Wild Pokemon, that Pokemon Flees.

close combat.descEffects: The user fights the target in close without guarding itself. The user's Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages.

collision course.descEffects: The user crashes into the ground, causing an explosion. This Move deals an additional 1 Wound if the target is vulnerable to it.

combat torque.descEffects: The user increases their inner torque and spins around. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

counter.descEffects: The user gathers the energy of a Physical Move that has hit them this Round and counters it, sending it back as a singular hit at the creature that attacked them. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to twice the Wounds that the Physical Move dealt, not adding or subtracting any additional damage (such as S.T.A.B., Resistance, etc.). If the attacking creature is no longer in Battle, or if the user has not been hit by a Physical Move this Round, this Move fails. If the user was hit by a Physical Move that delivers multiple hits, it only considers the damage from the first hit.

cross chop.descEffects: The user delivers a double-chop with their forearms. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

double kick.descEffects: The user quickly kicks twice, hitting up to two targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

drain punch.descEffects: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch, regaining an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

dynamic punch.descEffects: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This will Confuse the target on a hit for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

flying press.descEffects: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. For the purposes for resistance, vulnerability, and immunity, this Move is also a Flying-Type Move.

focus punch.descEffects: The user enters a stance in the Priority Phase, focusing their mind and taking no other part of their turn. At the end of the Round, once all other creatures have taken their Turns, the user may use their Movement Speed and then release a devastating punch. If the user is hit by a Physical or Special Move between entering the stance and releasing its punch, this Move fails.

force palm.descEffects: The user hits the target with a wave of force. This Move may Paralyze the target.

hammer arm.descEffects: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist, striking only enemy creatures in range. The user's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

high jump kick.descEffects: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself and takes 3 Wounds.

jump kick.descEffects: The user jumps up high and strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself and takes 3 Wounds.

karate chop.descEffects: The user attacks with a sharp chop. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

low kick.descEffects: The user delivers a powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. This Move deals a number of Wounds based on the target's Size category: Small (1), Medium (2), Large (3), Huge (4), and Massive (5).

low sweep.descEffects: The user attacks the target's legs. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

mach punch.descEffects: The user throws a punch at wicked speed to strike first.

meteor assault.descEffects: The user attacks wildly with piercing force. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

power-up punch.descEffects: The user strikes the opponent to weather their fist. The user's Attack increases by +2 Stages.

revenge.descEffects: The user channels their rage into a strike. If the user has been dealt Wounds by the target using a Physical or Special Move this Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

reversal.descEffects: The user does an all out attack that deals damage equal to the number of Wounds the user has.

rock smash.descEffects: The user hits with a punch that can shatter boulders. The may lower the target's Defense by -2 Stages.

rolling kick.descEffects: The user gives a quick spin and a fast kick. The target may be Flinched.

sacred sword.descEffects: The user attacks by slicing with its long horn. Defending rolls made to avoid being hit by this Move do not add any changes to their Stages.

seismic toss.descEffects: The user grasps the target and slams them into the ground, assisted by gravity. This Move deals a number of Minor Wounds equal to the user's Rank.

sky uppercut.descEffects: The user jumps and swings an uppercut into the sky. The target does not benefit from the Full Obscurement of being in the sky when making defending rolls against this Move, and this Move can target creatures under the effects of Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop.

storm throw.descEffects: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target.

submission.descEffects: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. The user also takes Recoil damage.

superpower.descEffects: The user attacks the target with great power. The users Attack and Defense lower by -2 Stages.

thunderous kick.descEffects: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. The target's Defense lowers by -2 Stages.

triple arrows.descEffects: The user delivers an axe kick and fires three arrows. The target's Defense lowers by -2 Stages. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

triple kick.descEffects: The user attacks three times in sequence, hitting up to three targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

upper hand.descEffects: The user attacks with a preemptive open-palm slap at the target. If a creature within range uses a Priority Physical or Special Move and the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. This Move cannot be used without fulfilling this condition.

vital throw.descEffects: The user attacks with a slow but powerful attack. The damage from this Wound does not affect the target until the end of the Round.

wake-up slap.descEffects: The user slaps the target. If the target is Asleep, this Move deals twice as many Wounds and wakes up the target.

aura sphere.descEffects: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within their body.

final gambit.descEffects: The user sacrifices their life-force to risk everything on a final attack at the target. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to the user's remaining Wounds. When this Move hits, the user Faints.

focus blast.descEffects: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

secret sword.descEffects: The user cuts at the target with its long horn. When making the defending roll for this Move, use the target's Defense Die for the roll, rather than the target's Sp. Defense Die.

vacuum wave.descEffects: The user whirls its fist to send forward a blast of empty vacuum.

bulk up.descEffects: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up. The user's Attack and Defense increase by +2 Stages.

coaching.descEffects: The user gives quick advice to their allies. All ally creatures have their Attack and Defense increased by +2 Stages.

detect.descEffects: The user quickly evades all upcoming attacks. They cannot be affected by Moves used by other creatures until the end of the turn. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

mat block.descEffects: The user uses a pulled-up mat as a shield, protecting itself and allies from attacks. The user and ally creatures cannot be affected by Physical or Special Moves used by enemy creatures until the end of the turn.

no retreat.descEffects: The user increases all of its Stats by +2 Stages. The user cannot by Swapped Out or Flee until it Faints or the Battle Ends.

ockolock.descEffects: The user mystically prevents the target from escaping. The target cannot Swap or Flee without the use of an Ability, Item, or Move until the end of the Round. At the end of the Round, the target's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages.

quick guard.descEffects: The user protects itself and its allies from Priority Moves. Until the end of the turn, they cannot be affected by Priority Moves used by other creatures until the end of the turn. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

victory dance.descEffects: The user dances to usher in a victory and strength themself. The user's Attack, Defense, and Speed increase by +2 Stages.

bitter blade.descEffects: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of living into a slashing attack at the target. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

blaze kick.descEffects: The launches a fiery kick at the target. The target may be Burned. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

blazing torque.descEffects: The user increases their inner torque and spins around. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

fire fang.descEffects: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. The target may be Burned and/or Flinched

fire lash.descEffects: The user strikes with a burning lash. The target's Defense lowers by -2 Stages.

fire punch.descEffects: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. The target may be Burned.

flame charge.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in flames and charges forward for an attack. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages.

flame wheel.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The target may be Burned. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself.

flare blitz.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The target may be Burned. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself. The user also takes Recoil damage.

heat crash.descEffects: The user slams the target with its flame-covered body. This Move deals a number of Wounds based on the target's Size category: Small (1), Medium (2), Large (3), Huge (4), and Massive (5). If the target has used Minimize, this Move hits without fail, requiring no roll, and deals twice the number of Wounds.

pyro ball.descEffects: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. The target may be Burned. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself.

raging fury.descEffects: The user begins to rampage and spew flames for 2-3 Rounds. The user may select a new target for this Move each Round. If this Move misses or is interrupted by a status condition, it ends early. When this Move ends, the user becomes Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

sacred fire.descEffects: The user razes with a mystical fire of great intensity. The target may be Burned. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself.

sizzly side.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The target is Burned.

temper flare.descEffects: The user is spurred by desperation to attack the target. If the user missed with another Move on the previous Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

v-create.descEffects: The user hurls itself at its target with hot flame. The user's Defense, Sp. Defense, and Speed lower by -2 Stages.

armor cannon.descEffects: The user shoots out its own armor as blazing projectiles. The user's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages.

blast burn.descEffects: The user razes the field with a fiery explosion. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

blue flare.descEffects: The user attacks by engulfing the field in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

burn up.descEffects: The user erupts with all its power, burning itself out. If this user is Fire-Type, the user loses its Fire-Typing until the leave Battle. This Moves fails if used by a Pokemon that is not Fire-Type. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself.

burning jealousy.descEffects: The user attacks with fire powered by envy. If a creature hit by this Move has increased any of its Stages this Round, they are Burned.

ember.descEffects: The user spews small flames towards the target. The target may be Burned.

eruption.descEffects: The user explodes outward with pure fury. This Move deals one fewer Wound for each Wound that the user has (minimum 1).

fiery dance.descEffects: The user dances and flaps its flame-coated wings. There is a 50% chance that the user's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

fire blast.descEffects: The user attacks with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. The target may be Burned

fire pledge.descEffects: The user creates a 2 Sq. radius column of fire within range. If an ally creature uses Water Pledge or Grass Pledge and the user has not yet taken their turn, the user may skip their Turn this Round, expend one PP from this Move,  and have that Water Pledge or Grass Pledge deal twice as many Wounds. If Water Pledge is affected this way, a rainbow appears over the field for 2 Rounds that grants ally creatures the Serene Grace ability (in addition to their other abilities). If Grass Pledge is affected this way, a sea of fire appears on the battlefield for 2 Rounds that deals 1 Wound to each non-Fire-Type Pokemon at the end of each Round. If a rainbow, sea of fire, or swamp are already present on the battlefield (by being summoned by a Pledge move), then this Move does not create a rainbow or sea of fire.

fire spin.descEffects: The user releases a spinning torrent of flames that surround each enemy creature on the Field. Creatures hit by this Move are Bound in an intense spiral of fire that rages for 1d4 + 1 turns.

flame burst.descEffects: The user attack the target with an exploding flame. Regardless of if this Move hits or misses, creatures within 1 Sq. of the target takes 1 Wound of Fire-Type damage.

flamethrower.descEffects: The user scorches out an intense blast of fire. Creatures hit by this Move may be left with a Burn.

fusion flare.descEffects: The user throws down a giant flame. If the Move most recently used was Fusion Bolt, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

heat wave.descEffects: The user exhales a heated searing breath. Creatures hit by this Move may be left with a Burn.

incinerate.descEffects: The user attacks with carbonizing fire. If a creature is holding a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

inferno.descEffects: The user selects a point within range and engulfs it with a 3 Sq. radius pillar of fire that stretches into the sky. Creatures hit by this Move are Burned.

lava plume.descEffects: The user releases an inferno of scarlet flames to wash over the battlefield. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

magma storm.descEffects: The user releases a maelstrom that surround each enemy creature on the Field. Creatures hit by this Move are Bound in spinning flames that rages for 1d4 + 1 turns.

mind blown.descEffects: The user attacks everything around it, causing its head to explode. The user takes 5 Wounds.

mystical fire.descEffects: The user breathes forth a cone of swirling magical fire. Creatures is hit by this Move, have their Sp. Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

overheat.descEffects: The user attacks with a full-power fiery attack. When this Move hits, the user's Sp. Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

searing shot.descEffects: The user releases an inferno of scarlet flames. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

shell trap.descEffects: The user sets a fiery trap on itself until the end of the Round. The first time the user is hit by a Physical Move, the trap triggers, releasing an explosion of flame at each creature in range.

torch song.descEffects: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song. The user's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

burning bulwark.descEffects: The user protects themself from all Physical and Special Moves that target them until the end of the Round with a fiery shield. If this Move blocks a Contact Move this way, the attacking creature is Burned. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

sunny day.descEffects: The user causes the sun to blaze for 5 Rounds, creating Harsh Sunlight.

will-o-wisp.descEffects: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the target. The target is Burned.

acrobatics.descEffects: The user nimbly strikes all creatures around it. If the user is not holding a Held Item, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

aerial ace.descEffects: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes.

beak blast.descEffects: The user heats up its beak to release a devastating attack. Until the end of the Round, when a creature hits this creature with a Contact Move, it is Burned. At the end of the Round, after all other creatures have taken their Turns, the user may strike a creature in range.

bounce.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they bounce high into the air, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and slam the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. The target may be Paralyzed. The Moves Gust and Twister ignore the user's Full Obscurement granted by this Move,and they deal twice as many Wounds on a hit. The Moves Thunder, Sky Uppercut, and Smack Down ignore the user's Full Obscurement granted by this Move.

brave bird.descEffects: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes Recoil damage.

dragon's ascent.descEffects: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. The user's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages. If the user is a Rayquaza, it Mega Evolves.

drill peck.descEffects: The user performs a corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak that acts as a drill.

dual wingbeat.descEffects: The user beats its wings twice, striking up to two targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

floaty fall.descEffects: The user floats into the air and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. The target may be Flinched.

fly.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they soars into the sky and begin to glow, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and strike down at the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement.

peck.descEffects: The user jabs the target with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

pluck.descEffects: The user pecks at the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user consumes that Berry.

sky attack.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they fly high into the sky and begin to glow, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and strike down at the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

sky drop.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they grasp the target and fly into the air. Both the user and the target enter Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, the user drops the target to the ground. Both the user and the target leave Full Obscurement. Creatures with a flying or levitating movement speed take no Wounds from this Move.

wing attack.descEffects: The user strikes with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

aeroblast.descEffects: The user launches forward a vacuum shot. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

air cutter.descEffects: The user launches razor-like wind to slash enemy creatures. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

air slash.descEffects: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

bleakwind storm.descEffects: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages. If the Weather is Rain, this Move hits without fail, requiring no rolls.

chatter.descEffects: The user attacks with sound waves of deafening chatter. Creatures hit by this Move are Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

gust.descEffects: The user strikes with a strong gust of wind.

hurricane.descEffects: The user creates an engulfing hurricane that attacks all enemy creatures on the field. Creatures hit by this Move may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. This Move hits creatures high in the sky, as per the Bounce, Fly and Sky Drop moves. If the Weather is Rain, Hurricane does not require a roll to hit. If the Weather is not clear or Rain, this Move has a Disadvantage to its attacking roll.

oblivion wing.descEffects: The user uses draining winds to steal the target's life force. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

defog.descEffects: The user uses calming winds to strip away the target's defenses and to clear away the field's defenses. The target gains a Disadvantage to their defending rolls until the leave Battle. This Move fails if it targets a creature that is already under the effects of this Move. When this Move is used, removes all Hazards and ends the following Move's continuous effects: Light Screen, Reflect, Safeguard, Mist, and Aurora Veil.

feather dance.descEffects: The user blasts a mass of down feathers that stick to the target. The target's  Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

mirror move.descEffects: The user uses the Move that the target last used.

roost.descEffects: The user lands and rests its body, regaining 5 Wounds. The user has their Movement Speed set to 0 and loses its Flying type until the end of the Round.

tailwind.descEffects: The user whips up turbulent whirlwinds to increase their allies' speed. For 4 Rounds, ally creatures, including the user, have their Turn Order doubled.

astonish.descEffects: The user shouts as they strike forwards, and the target may be Flinched.

last respects.descEffects: The user fires a tombstone to avenge its allies. This Move deals an additional 2 Wounds for each ally creature that has Fainted this Battle.

lick.descEffects: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This Move may Paralyze the target.

phantom force.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they disappear into the shadows, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and strike the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

poltergeist.descEffects: The user takes control of the target's Held Item and attacks them with it. This Move fails if it targets a creature that is not holding a Held Item.

rage fist.descEffects: The user converts their rage into energy and attacks with a phantom fist. This Move deals an additional 1 Wound for each time the user has been hit with a Physical or Special Move since it entered Battle (maximum 6).

shadow bone.descEffects: The user beats the target with a bone that contains a spirit. The target's Defense may lower by -2 Stages.

shadow claw.descEffects: The user attacks with a set of ghostly blades or claws. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

shadow force.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they disappear into the shadows, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and strike the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

shadow punch.descEffects: The user throws a punch from the shadows.

shadow sneak.descEffects: The user extends its shadow toward a target and attacks from behind. As part of using this Move, the user may teleport to any spot within a distance equal to its Movement Speed. This teleporting does not count as part of its movement for the Turn.

spectral thief.descEffects: The user hides in the targets shadow and strikes them to steal their power. If the target has an positive Stage changes, the user adds those Stage increases to their stats and the target has those Stages returned to 0.

spirit shackle.descEffects: The user attacks, stitching the target's shadow to the ground. The target cannot Swap or Flee without the use of an Ability, Item, or Move until the user leaves Battle.

astral barrage.descEffects: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokemon.

bitter malice.descEffects: The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. The target' Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

hex.descEffects: The user releases a relentless ghostly attack at the target. If the target has a Status Condition, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

infernal parade.descEffects: The user attacks with myriad fireballs, attacking each enemy creature in range. If a creature hit by this Move has a Status Condition, this Move deals twice as many Wounds. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

moongeist beam.descEffects: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This Move ignores all Abilities that would affect it.

night shade.descEffects: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to the user's Rank.

ominous wind.descEffects: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. There is a 25% chance that the user's Stats all increase by +2 Stages.

shadow ball.descEffects: The user hurls a shadowy black blob of ghostly energy at the target. The target's Sp. Defense may lower by -2 Stages.

confuse ray.descEffects: The user exposes the target to a sinister ray of energy that Confuses the target for 1d4 + 1 turns.

curse.descEffects: The user concentrates on malevolent thoughts. The user's Attack and Defense increase by +2 Stages and their Speed lowers by -2 Stages. If the user is a ghost-type, they do not gain the bonuses. Instead, they select a target within 10 Sq. of them and give them the special status condition 'Haunted' until they leave Battle. A Haunted creature takes 2 Wounds of damage at the end of each Round.

destiny bond.descEffects: The user creates a spectral life-bond between themself and the target. Until the user or the target leaves Battle, if the user Faints from a Physical or Special Move used by the target, the target immediately also Faints. If the user used this Move in the previous Round, this move fails.

grudge.descEffects: The user prepares the anger in it's soul to leave a lasting grudge. Until the beginning of the user's next Turn, if the user Faints as the result of being attacked by a Physical or Special Move, the attacking creature loses all PP of that Move.

nightmare.descEffects: The user selects a target that is Asleep. At the end of each Round that target is Asleep, they take 3 Wounds from a vicious nightmare. This effect ends when the target is no longer Asleep. This Move fails is it targets a creature that is not Asleep.

spite.descEffects: The user reduces the PP of the Move last used by the target by 1d4 +1 PP. If the total it would decrease it to is more than 0, it reduces that PP to 0.

trick-or-treat.descEffects: The user fills the target with spooky whimsical energy. The target gains the Ghost-Typing until it leaves Battle.

branch poke.descEffects: The user pokes the target with a sharpened branch.

bullet seed.descEffects: The user fires hard seeds at 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

drum beating.descEffects: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack. Creatures hit by this Move have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

flower trick.descEffects: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target.

grassy glide.descEffects: The user slides along the ground to strike the opponent. If a Grassy Terrain is in effect during the Priority Phase, this Move may be used as though it had Priority.

grav apple.descEffects: The user floats an apple high above the target and drops it down on them. The target's Defense lowers by -2 Stages.

horn leech.descEffects: The user drains the target's energy with their horns. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

ivy cudgel.descEffects: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. If the user is an Ogerpon, this Move changes type based on the user's Mask: Grass (Teal), Water (Wellspring), Fire (Hearthflame), and Rock (Cornerstone).

leaf blade.descEffects: The user slashes around themself with a sharp sword-like leaf. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

leafage.descEffects: The user pelts the target with a clump of leaves.

needle arm.descEffects: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

petal blizzard.descEffects: The user summons a violent petal blizzard that hits all creatures other than the user on the Field.

power whip.descEffects: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to lash out.

razor leaf.descEffects: The user launches sharp-edged leaves at the target. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

sappy seed.descEffects: The user throws a seed-bearing stalk at the target, slamming into it. The target is 'Seeded' until they leave Battle. A 'Seeded' creature takes 1 Wound at the end of each Round. The user regains 1 Wound for each Wound dealt this way.

seed bomb.descEffects: The user sends a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on a 2 Sq. radius spot within range.

snap trap.descEffects: The user snares the target in a snap trap. The target is Bound for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

solar blade.descEffects: The user performs a two-turn attack. On the first turn, the user gathers light. On the second turn, the user slices with a blade of light. In Harsh Sunlight, the user does not require a turn to gather light and instead immediately fires a beam. In Weather that is not clear or Harsh Sunlight, this Move deals half as many Wounds, rounded down (minimum 1).

trailblaze.descEffects: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping from tall grass. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages.

trop kick.descEffects: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. The target's Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

vine whip.descEffects: The user strikes their target with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

wood hammer.descEffects: The user slams its rugged body into the target. This Move deals Recoil damage.

absorb.descEffects: The user drains the nutrients from the target. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

apple acid.descEffects: The user sprays an acidic liquid created from tart apples. Creatures hit by this move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

chloroblast.descEffects: The user launches amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage. This Move deals Recoil damage.

energy ball.descEffects: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. The target's Sp. Defense may lower by -2 Stages.

frenzy plant.descEffects: The user slams enormous branches forward. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

giga drain.descEffects: The user drains the nutrients from their target, regaining an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

grass knot.descEffects: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. This Move deals a number of Wounds based on the target's Size category: Small (1), Medium (2), Large (3), Huge (4), and Massive (5).

grass pledge.descEffects: The user creates a 2 Sq. radius column of razor-sharp grass within range. If an ally creature uses Water Pledge or Fire Pledge and the user has not yet taken their turn, the user may skip their Turn this Round, expend one PP from this Move, and have that Water Pledge or Fire Pledge deal twice as many Wounds. If Water Pledge is affected this way, a swamp appears on the field for 2 Rounds that quarter's enemy Pokemon's Turn Order (rounded down). If Fire Pledge is affected this way, a sea of fire appears on the battlefield for 2 Rounds that deals 1 Wound to each non-Fire-Type Pokemon at the end of each Round. If a rainbow, sea of fire, or swamp are already present on the battlefield (by being summoned by a Pledge move), then this Move does not create a swamp or sea of fire.

leaf storm.descEffects: The user whips up a storm of sharp leaves. The user's Sp. Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

leaf tornado.descEffects: The user swirls sharpened leaves across a 2 Sq. radius area within range. Creatures hit by this Move are Blinded until they leave Battle.

magical leaf.descEffects: The user attacks with a curious leaves that chase the target.

matcha gotcha.descEffects: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1). The Target may be Burned.

mega drain.descEffects: The user drains the nutrients from their target, regaining an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

petal dance.descEffects: The user does a dance-like attack that lasts 2 or 3 Rounds (chosen at random). After the dance completes, the user becomes Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

seed flare.descEffects: The user generates a shockwave from within its body. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Sp. Defense lowered by -4 Stages.

solar beam.descEffects: The user performs a two-turn attack. On the first turn, the user gathers light. On the second turn, the user blasts light in a massive beam. In Harsh Sunlight, the user does not require a turn to gather light and instead immediately fires a beam. In Weather that is not clear or Harsh Sunlight, this Move deals half as many Wounds, rounded down (minimum 1).

syrup bomb.descEffects: The user explosively coats the target in sticky candy syrup. The target is 'Coated' in syrup for 3 Rounds. At the end of each Round, a 'Coated' creature has their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

aromatherapy.descEffects: The user releases a soothing scent to heal the Status Conditions of itself, all of its allies, and all creatures in Party.

cotton guard.descEffects: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton. The user's Defense increases by +6 Stages.

cotton spore.descEffects: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target. The target's Speed lowers by -4 Stages.

forest's curse.descEffects: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target becomes Grass-Type, in addition to its other types. If this Move targets a Grass-Type, it fails.

grass whistle.descEffects: The user plays a pleasant melody that makes all creatures affected fall Asleep.

grassy terrain.descEffects: The user turns the ground under everyones feet to grass, creating a Grassy Terrain for 5 Rounds.

ingrain.descEffects: The user lays down roots to draw in nutrients. At the end of each Round, the regains 1 Wound. The user's Movement Speed becomes 0 and the cannot be Swapped or Returned until they have Fainted or the Battle ends.

jungle healing.descEffects: The user becomes one with the forest, healing itself and its allies. Ally creatures, including the user, regain 2 Wounds and are cured of all status conditions.

leech seed.descEffects: The user releases several seeds that may stick onto enemy creatures. Creatures hit by this Move become 'Seeded' until they leave Battle. A 'Seeded' creature takes 1 Wound at the end of each Round. The user regains 1 Wound for each Wound dealt this way.

sleep powder.descEffects: The user releases a cloud of pollen. Creatures hit by this Move fall Asleep.

spicy extract.descEffects: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract at the target. The target's Attack increases by +2 Stages. The target's Defense lowers by -2 Stages.

spiky shield.descEffects: The user protects themselves with a veil of thorns. They cannot be affected by Moves used by other creatures until the end of the turn, and if a creature touches them while protected, the attacker suffers 2 Minor Wounds. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

spore.descEffects: The user scatters mushroom spores that only target enemy creatures. Creatures hit by this Move fall Asleep.

strength sap.descEffects: The user restores its health by stealing the target's strength. The user regains a number of Wounds based on the target's Attack Die size: 1 (d4), 2 (d6), 3 (d8), 4 (d10), 5 (d12), 6 (d20). The target's Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

stun spore.descEffects: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. Creatures hit by this Move are Paralyzed.

synthesis.descEffects: The user absorbs energy from their environment and regains 4 Wounds. If the Weather is Harsh Sunlight, they instead regain 8 Wounds. If the Weather is not clear or Harsh Sunlight, they instead regain 2 Wounds.

worry seed.descEffects: The user fire curious seeds. Creatures hit by this Move have their Ability changed to Insomnia until they leave Battle.

bone club.descEffects: The user clubs the target with a bone. The target may Flinch.

bone rush.descEffects: The user strikes with a bone club at 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

bonemerang.descEffects: The user throws the bone its holding to hit up to 2 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

bulldoze.descEffects: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. Creatures hit by this move have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

dig.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they deep underground, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and burst out underneath the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. The Moves Earthquake, Magnitude, and Fissure ignore the user's Full Obscurement granted by this Move,and they deal twice as many Wounds on a hit.

drill run.descEffects: The user crashes into the target while rotating their body like a drill. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

earthquake.descEffects: The user creates an earthquake that tremors and throws debris to hit every creature on the field. Creatures that are underground, such as through Dig or a burrowing speed, are dealt twice as many Wounds by this Move.

fissure.descEffects: The user creates a fissure underneath the target that crushes them. When making an attacking roll with this Move, the user takes a Disadvantage. When this Move hits, the target Faints. If the target's Rank is higher than the user's Rank, this Move fails. The target does not benefit from the Full Obscurement of being underground when making defending rolls against this Move, and this Move can target creatures under the effect of Dig.

headlong rush.descEffects: The user smashes into the target in a full body tackle. The user's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages.

high horsepower.descEffects: The user frantically attacks all around it using its entire body.

land's wrath.descEffects: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses it on all enemy creatures.

magnitude.descEffects: The user causes the ground to shake, creating an earthquake of random intensity. This Move deals 1d8 Wounds to creatures hit by it.

precipice blades.descEffects: The user attacks only enemy creatures by manifesting fearsome blades of stone.

sand tomb.descEffects: The user releases a vortex of spiraling sand that wraps around all enemy creatures on the Field. Creatures hit by this Move are Bound in an intense column of sand that rages for 1d4 + 1 turns.

stomping tantrum.descEffects: The user attacks all around it with a frustrated drive. If the user missed with another Move on the previous Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

thousand arrows.descEffects: The user rains arrows of power from the sky, hitting all enemy creatures. Creatures that are immune to Ground-Type Moves do not have immunity to this Move, instead taking normal damage. Creatures do not benefit from the Full Obscurement of being in the sky when making defending rolls against this Move, and this Move can target creatures under the effects of Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop. If this Move hits a creature under the effect of Fly, Bounce, or Sky Drop, that Move ends early and that creatures loses its Full Obscurement.

thousand waves.descEffects: The user attacks with a wave that crawls across the ground. Creatures hit by this Move cannot Swap or Flee without the use of an Ability, Item, or Move until the user leaves Battle.

earth power.descEffects: The user causes a 3 Sq. radius of earth within range to erupt. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

mud bomb.descEffects: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. The target is Blinded until they leave Battle.

mud shot.descEffects: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

mud-slap.descEffects: The user hurls mud in the faces of only enemy creatures within range. Creatures hit by this Move are Blinded until they leave Battle.

sandsear storm.descEffects: The user wraps the battlefield in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. Creatures hit by this Move are Burned.

scorching sands.descEffects: The user throws scorching sand forward. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

mud sport.descEffects: The user kicks up mud all around the battlefield. Until the user leaves Battle, all Electric-Type Moves deal half as many Wounds (rounded up).

rototiller.descEffects: The user tills the soil of the field, making it easier for plants to grow. Grass-Type creatures have their Attack and Sp. Attack increased by +2 Stages.

sand attack.descEffects: The user hurls sand forward. Creatures hit by this Move are Blinded until they leave Battle.

sandstorm.descEffects: The user swirls sand and rock to create a Sandstorm for 5 Rounds.

shore up.descEffects: The user absorbs energy from their environment and regains 4 Wounds. If Weather is Sandstorm, they instead regain 8 Wounds. If the Weather is not clear or Sandstorm, they instead regain 2 Wounds.

spikes.descEffects: The user scatters ground-type empowered spikes across the field that lasts until the Battle Ends. When an enemy creature enters Battle, those spikes deal 1 Wound to that creature. Up to three uses of this Move can be present in Battle at a time. When this Move is used for a fourth time, the oldest occurrence of this Move vanishes.

avalanche.descEffects: The user attacks with an ice-infused rageful attack. If the user has been dealt Wounds by the target using a Physical or Special Move this Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

freeze shock.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user cloaks itself in freezing light. On the second turn, the user releases a blast of electrically charged ice.

glacial lance.descEffects: The user hurls a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance.

ice ball.descEffects: The user tucks itself into an icy ball and begins to roll for 5 Rounds.
