Each turn, without expending an additional PP, the user strikes at a target within range, dealing an additional Wound for each previous time this Move has hit since the user began rolling. If the user cannot hit a target, misses a target, or leaves Battle, this Move ends early. If the user is under the effects of Defense Curl, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

ice fang.descEffects: The user bites the target with cold-infused fangs. The target may be Frozen and/or Flinched.

ice hammer.descEffects: The user swings and hits with a strong, heavy fist. The user's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

ice punch.descEffects: The user punches with an icy fist. The target may be Frozen.

ice shard.descEffects: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target.

ice spinner.descEffects: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into only enemy creatures. All Terrains end.

icicle crash.descEffects: The user harshly drops an icicle onto the target. The target may be Flinched.

icicle spear.descEffects: The user launches sharp icicles at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

mountain gale.descEffects: The user hurls a giant chunk of ice at a 2 Sq. radius point within range. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

triple axel.descEffects: The user throws consecutive kicks at up to 3 targets. The first kick deals 1 Wound, and the second and third kicks each deal 2 Wounds. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

aurora beam.descEffects: The user releases a rainbow-colored beam. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Attack lowered by -2 Stage.

blizzard.descEffects: The user summons a howling blizzard to strike the field. Creatures hit by this Move may be Frozen.. While the user is in Hail, this attack lands without fail, requiring no rolls.

freeze-dry.descEffects: The user rapidly cools the target. The target may be Frozen. Water-Type creatures are vulnerable to this Move.

freezy frost.descEffects: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. All creatures in Battle have their Stages set to 0.

frost breath.descEffects: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target.

glaciate.descEffects: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air. Creatures hit by this Move have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

ice beam.descEffects: The user strikes with an icy-cold beam of energy. Creatures hit by this Move may be Frozen.

ice burn.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user cloaks themself in freezing air. On the second turn, the user blasts ultra-cold freezing winds. Creatures hit by this Move may be Burned.

icy wind.descEffects: The user spreads a gust of chilled air. Creatures hit by this Move have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

powder snow.descEffects: The user blasts forward a chilling gust of powdery snow. Creatures hit by this Move may be Frozen.

sheer cold.descEffects: The user blasts the target with absolute-zero cold. When making an attacking roll with this Move, the user takes a Disadvantage. When this Move hits, the target Faints. If the target's Rank is higher than the user's Rank, this Move fails.

aurora veil.descEffects: The user creates an opalescent barrier that protects itself and its allies for 5 Turns. During this time, whenever the user or an ally creature would take Wounds from a Physical or Special Move, they instead take half as many Wounds (rounded up). If a creature is under the effect of Reflect or Light Screen, they gain no benefit from this Move. If this Move is used while the Weather is not Hail, this Move fails.

chilly reception.descEffects: The user tells a chillingly bad joke, then the user immediately Swaps with another creature in their Party. If there are no other creatures to Swap with, this effect fails. If this Move is used against a Wild Pokemon, the user instead Flees. The user creates Hail for 5 Rounds.

hail.descEffects: The user whips snow into the air for 5 Rounds, creating Hail.

haze.descEffects: The user creates a black haze that eliminates stat changes. All creatures in Battle have their Stages set to 0. All creatures in Battle lose any continuous effects from Moves. All creatures in Battle lose all status conditions.

mist.descEffects: The user cloaks the field in a white mist until they leave Battle. Ally creatures, including the user, cannot have their Stages lowered while the mist is present.

barrage.descEffects: The user hurls round objects at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

bide.descEffects: The user begins a three-turn attack. On the first and second turns, the user will idli stand, absorbing the power of attacks that strike it. On the third turn, the user pours that energy into a single strike. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to twice the number of Wounds from Physical and Special Moves that the user received since initiating this Move. If the user has taken no Wounds from Physical or Special Moves while idly standing, this Move fails.

bind.descEffects: The user grasps onto the target for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. While grabbed this way, the target is Bound. If the user leaves Battle, this Move ends early. The user is unable to use other Moves while using this Move.

body slam.descEffects: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This Move may Paralyze the target. If the target has used Minimize, this Move hits without fail, requiring no roll, and deals twice the number of Wounds.

chip away.descEffects: The user looks for an opening before striking persistently. Defending rolls made to avoid being hit by this Move do not add any changes to their Stages.

comet punch.descEffects: The user sends a flurry of punches at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

constrict.descEffects: The user attacks with long, creeping tentacles or vines. The target's Speed may lower by -2 Stages.

covet.descEffects: The user endearingly approaches the target, then attacks. If the target is holding a Held Item and the user is not holding a Held Item, the user steals the target's Held Item.

crush claw.descEffects: The user slashes at the target with hard and sharp claws. The target's Defense may lower by -2 Stages.

crush grip.descEffects: The user crushes the target with great force. This Move deals one fewer Wound for each Wound that the user has (minimum 1).

cut.descEffects: The user cuts with a scythe or claw.

dizzy punch.descEffects: The user lands a rhythmically launched punch. The target may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

double hit.descEffects: The user slams up to two targets with a tail or the like. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

double slap.descEffects: The user repeatedly slaps up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

double-edge.descEffects: The user recklessly slams into the target with a life-risking tackle. This Move deals Recoil damage.

egg bomb.descEffects: The user hurls an explosive egg at a spot in range, hitting creatures within a 1 Sq. radius of that spot.

endeavor.descEffects: The user inflicts damage by making the amount of Wound damage that the target has equal to its own. This Move cannot damage the target to a lower Wound amount than the user has. If the target has fewer Wounds than the user, this Move fails.

explosion.descEffects: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user Faints.

extreme speed.descEffects: The user charges at the target with blindingly fast speed. The user moves to the target when using this Move, no additional movement required.

facade.descEffects: The user puts on a brave face and attacks. If the user is Burned, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Badly Poisoned, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

fake out.descEffects: The user strikes quickly to surprise their opponent. The target is Flinched on a hit. This Move can only be used on the Round that the user enters Battle.

false swipe.descEffects: The user sends out a restrained attack. This Move cannot reduce a creature to fewer than 1 Wound.

feint.descEffects: The user nimbly attacks.  This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

flail.descEffects: The user gives an aimless flail attack that deals damage equal to the number of Wounds the user has.

frustration.descEffects: The user does a full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the more unsafe the user feels. This Move deals a number of wounds equal to half of its Rage or Fear points, rounded up (minimum one).

fury attack.descEffects: The user jabs at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

fury swipes.descEffects: The user rakes sharp claws at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

giga impact.descEffects: The user charges the target with every bit of their power. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

guillotine.descEffects: The user does a vicious tearing attack with large pincers. When this Move hits, the target Faints. If the target's Rank is higher than the user's Rank, this Move fails.

head charge.descEffects: The user charges its head into the target. This Move deals Recoil damage.

headbutt.descEffects: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. The target may be Flinched.

hold back.descEffects: The user holds back when it attacks. This Move cannot reduce a creature to fewer than 1 Wound.

horn attack.descEffects: The user jabs with a sharply pointed horn.

horn drill.descEffects: The user's horn stabs like a rotating drill. When making an attacking roll with this Move, the user takes a Disadvantage. When this Move hits, the target Faints. If the target's Rank is higher than the user's Rank, this Move fails.

hyper drill.descEffects: The user spins the pointed part of its body at piercing speed. This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

hyper fang.descEffects: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. The target may be Flinched.

last resort.descEffects: The user strikes out in desperation. If the user has not expended a PP from each other Move that it knows since entering Battle, this Move fails.

mega kick.descEffects: The user launches a kick of muscle-packed power.

mega punch.descEffects: The user slugs with a punch of muscle-packed power.

multi-attack.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in powerful energy before attack. If the user has the ability RKS System and is holding a Memory, this Move's type changes to the same Type as the Memory.

natural gift.descEffects: The user infuses their attack with the power of a Berry. This Move fails if the user is not holding a Berry. This Move's type changes based on the Berry that is being held by the user.

pay day.descEffects: The user hurls a handful of summoned coins at the target. At the end of the Battle, the winner receives a number of PokeDollars equal to 20 x the user's rank. This benefit can only be granted once per day by the user.

population bomb.descEffects: The user's fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that strikes 1d10 times. When using this Move, all attacks must target the same creature. If the target Faints before all attacks have been made, this Move ends early. Each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

pound.descEffects: The user hits the target with a long tail, foreleg, or similar body part.

present.descEffects: The user throws a booby-trapped present at the target, harming or healing them randomly. This Move has a 50% chance of dealing 1d3 Wounds to the target. If this Move does not deal Wounds to the target, the target regains 2 Wounds.

quick attack.descEffects: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. The user gains an additional 2 Sqr. to their Movement Speed this Turn.

rage.descEffects: They user lashes out at a target. Whenever that target hits the user with a Move that deals damage before the user's next Turn. the user's Attack increases by +2 Stages. If the user would use a different Move than Rage, the use loses all Stage increases from Rage before using that Move.

raging bull.descEffects: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. Before calculating damage, this move ends all barriers from the target's side of the field, such a Aurora Veil, Light Screen, and Reflect.

rapid spin.descEffects: The user performs a spin attack at target. This Move removes all Hazards from the field, the Bound status condition from the user, and ends the effects of the following Moves: Leech Seed, Snap Trap, and Wrap. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages.

retaliate.descEffects: The user takes revenge through their attack. If an ally Pokemon has Fainted during the previous Round or during the Round, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

return.descEffects: The user does a full-power attack that grows more powerful the more it likes its trainer. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to half of its Friendship Points, rounded up (minimum one).

rock climb.descEffects: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This Move may Confuse the target.

scratch.descEffects: The user rakes at the target with hard, pointed, and sharp claws.

secret power.descEffects: The user channels their environment into an attack. Depending on the location or Terrain that the user is in, this Move may inflict one of the following conditions on the target: Paralyzed (buildings, roads, or Electric Terrain), Flinched (caves), Blinded (sandy, dirt-filled, or rocky areas), lower Attack by -2 Stages (water), Frozen (snow and ice), Burned (volcano or lava), lower Defense by -2 Stages (Ultra Space), Asleep (grass, forests, or Grassy Terrain), lower Sp. Attack by -2 Stages (Misty Terrain), lower Speed by -2 Stages (Psychic Terrain).

self-destruct.descEffects: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user Faints.

skull bash.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user tucks in their head. The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages. On the second turn, the user rams a target with their head.

slam.descEffects: The slams its target with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

slash.descEffects: The user attacks with a set of blades or claws. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

smelling salts.descEffects: The user attacks in with an invigorating slap. If the target is Paralyzed, this Move deals twice as many Wounds. The target is no longer Paralyzed.

spike cannon.descEffects: The user fire spike shots at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

stomp.descEffects: The user stomps the target with a big foot. The target may be Flinched.

strength.descEffects: The user slugs with a punch thrown at maximum power.

struggle.descEffects: The user desperately writhes. This Move deals Recoil damage. All creatures can use this Move without it being learn. This Move can only be used when all of the user's other Moves are unusable, such as by having 0 PP or being Disabled.

super fang.descEffects: The user chomps down hard on the target, dealing a number of Wounds equal to half of the target's remaining Wounds (rounded down, minimum 1).

tackle.descEffects: The user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

tail slap.descEffects: The user slaps their tail at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

take down.descEffects: The user recklessly slams into the target. This Move deals Recoil damage.

thrash.descEffects: The user rampages and attacks for 1d4 - 1 Rounds (minimum 1). Once it has attacked for the final time, the user becomes Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. If this move is interrupted due to the user being unable to attack, it ends early and the user is not confused.

veevee volley.descEffects: The user does a full-power attack that grows more powerful the more it likes its trainer. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to half of its Friendship Points, rounded up (minimum one).

vice grip.descEffects: The user grips and squeezes the target from both sides to inflict damage.

wrap.descEffects: The user wraps their long body or vines around the target for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. While grabbed this way, the target is Bound. If the user leaves Battle, this Move ends early. The user is unable to use other Moves while using this Move.

blood moon.descEffects: The user unleashes the full brunt of the spirit of the full moon on a 2 Sq. radius spot within range. This Move cannot be used two Turns in a row by the user.

boomburst.descEffects: The user releases an explosion of sound.

echoed voice.descEffects: The user unleashes a powerful vocal attack that builds upon itself. This Move deals an additional 2 Wounds for each consecutive Round that any creature has used this Move (maximum 10). If a Round passes without any creature using this Move, this bonus resets.

hidden power.descEffects: The user releases a move that is unique to themself and draws upon their inner power. When the user learns this Move, choose a Type at random, excluding Normal or Fairy Type. This Move is now treated as that Type by the user.

hyper beam.descEffects: The user releases a beam that includes every bit of their power. The user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

hyper voice.descEffects: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

judgement.descEffects: The user releases countless shots of light at all enemy creatures on the field. If the user is holding a Plate, this Move's Type becomes the same Type as the Plate. If the user is holding the Legend Plate, this Move remains Normal-Type, but it bypasses immunity and resistance to this Move, making all creatures vulnerable to this Move.

razor wind.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user summons a whirlwind to surround themself. On the second turn, the user blasts that wind out as a razor-sharp blade. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

relic song.descEffects: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. Creatures hit by this Move may fall Asleep.

revelation dance.descEffects: The user attacks by dancing very hard. This Move's Type becomes the Primary Type of the user.

round.descEffects: The user attacks the target with a song. If another creature uses this Move, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. If this Move is being used after another creature has used this Move this Round, this Move deals twice the number of Wounds.

snore.descEffects: The user rumbles a sonic-blast while sleeping. If the user is not Asleep, this Move cannot be used. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

sonic boom.descEffects: The user sends out a shock wave. This Move always deals 2 Wounds, ignoring S.T.A.B., Resistances, Weaknesses, Items, and Abilities. This Move bypasses immunity and resistance to this Move, making all creatures take normal damage from this Move.

spit up.descEffects: The user releases the energy that they've stored as an attack. If the user has no Stockpile stacks, this Move fails. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to 3 times the user's Stockpile stacks. When this Move is used, the user loses all Stockpile stacks.

swift.descEffects: The user shoots star-shaped rays at the target.

techno blast.descEffects: The user releases a beam of light.  If the user is holding a Drive, this Move's Type becomes the same Type as the Drive.

tera blast.descEffects: The user launches a blast of their hidden inner power. If the user is Terastalized, this Move becomes the same Type as the user's Tera Type. If the user is Terastalized and the user's Attack Die size is larger than the user's Sp. Attack Die size, this Move is a Physical Move instead of a Special Move.

tera starstorm.descEffects: The user bombards the target with the power of crystals. When this Move is used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this Move becomes a Field Move that targets only enemy creatures.  If the user is Terastalized and the user's Attack Die size is larger than the user's Sp. Attack Die size, this Move is a Physical Move instead of a Special Move.

terrain pulse.descEffects: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. If a Terrain is active, this Move deals an additional 2 Wounds on a hit. Wounds and changes to the following Type: Electric (Electric Terrain), Grass (Grassy Terrain), Fairy (Misty Terrain), or Psychic (Psychic Terrain).

tri attack.descEffects: The user launches three simultaneous beams of light. Creatures hit by this Move may develop one of the following status conditions (chosen at random): Burned, Paralyzed, or Frozen

trump card.descEffects: The user launches a powerful attack. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to 9 divided by the Move's remaining PP, rounded down (minimum 1).

uproar.descEffects: The user creates an 'uproar' that lasts 3 Rounds. During this time, the user can use their movement speed, but can carry out no other Commands. Creatures cannot fall Asleep while this Move is active, and any sleeping creatures are awoken at the end of the user's Turn. If no creature has taken any Wounds from this Move in a Round, this Move immediately ends.

weather ball.descEffects: The user sends a compact ball of weather at a 1 Sq. radius point within range. If the Weather is not clear, this Move deals twice as many Wounds. This Move's Type changes based on the Weather to the following Type: Fire (Harsh Sunlight), Water (Rain), Ice (Hail), or Rock (Sandstorm).

wring out.descEffects: The user powerfully wrings out the foe. This Move deals one fewer Wound for each Wound that the target has (minimum 1).

acupressure.descEffects: The user applies pressure to their pressure points, randomly increasing their abilities. The user randomly selects one of their Stats that has fewer than +12 Stages. That stat increases by +4 Stages.

after you.descEffects: The user helps the target to move right after the user. The target will take their Turn directly after the user's Turn, regardless of Turn Order. If the user targets a creature that has already taken its Turn, this Move fails.

assist.descEffects: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a Move from among its friends. The user uses a Move known by another creature in its Party, chosen at random.

attract.descEffects: The user smiles suggestively at the target. The target becomes Infatuated with the user until they leave Battle.

baton pass.descEffects: The user Swaps with another Pokemon in their Trainer's Party. All Stage changes and continuous Moves that the user was under are transferred to the Swapped Pokemon, as is the Confused condition.

belly drum.descEffects: The user slaps its belly with rhythm, dealing 5 Wounds to itself. The user's Attack increases by +8 Stages. If using this Move would cause the user to Faint, this Move fails.

bestow.descEffects: The user grants a gift to the target. The user give the target their Held Item. If target is already holding a Held Item, or the user has no Held Item, this Move fails.

block.descEffects: The user prevents the target from being able to Swap or Flee until the user leaves Battle.

camouflage.descEffects: The user alters their Type to match their environment. Depending on the location or Terrain that the user is in, the user changes to one of the following Types: Normal (buildings or roads), Rock (caves), Ground (sandy, dirt-filled, or rocky areas), Water (water), Ice (snow and ice), Fire (volcano or lava), Grass (grass, forests, or Grassy Terrain), Fairy (Misty Terrain), Electric (Electric Terrain) or Psychic (Psychic Terrain or Ultra Space).

captivate.descEffects: The user enchants a target that can see them with a captivating movement, which lowers the target's Sp. Attack by -4 Stages.

confide.descEffects: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate.The target's Sp. Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

conversion.descEffects: The user converts themself for better efficiency. The user's Type becomes the same Type as the first Move in their Move slots.

conversion 2.descEffects: The user converts themself to defend themself from harm. The user's Type becomes a Type that is resistant or immune to the Type of the Move the target used last (chosen at random). If the target has not yet used a Move this Battle, this Move fails.

copycat.descEffects: The user mimics the Move last used by any other creature. This Move fails if no Move has been used yet.

court change.descEffects: The user swaps the homefield advantage with a mysterious power. All Hazards and continuous Field Move effects swap their side of the battle, benefiting or harming the opposite team.

defense curl.descEffects: The user curls up to conceal weak spots. The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages.

disable.descEffects: The user disables the Move that the target used most recently for 1d4 + 1 Rounds. The target treats that Move as though it has no PP for the duration, and this Move fails if that target has not yet used a Move, or most recently used Struggle. This move fails if one of the target's moves is already Disabled.

doodle.descEffects: The user and their friends emulate the target with a sketch. Ally creatures, including the user, lose their Ability and gain the ability of the target until they leave Battle.

double team.descEffects: The user moves rapidly moves to create illusory copies of itself. The user is treated as Heavily Obscured until they leave Battle.

encore.descEffects: The user compels the target to only use the Move that they've used most recently for the next 1d4 + 1 Rounds or until the target leaves Battle. This Move ends immediately if the creature is unable to use the encored Move in situations like running out of PP.

endure.descEffects: The user endures all attacks. For the rest of the turn, this Move allows the user to survive any attack that would cause it to Faint, leaving the user with 1 Wound instead. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

entrainment.descEffects: The user dances to an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it. The target loses their Ability and gains the Ability of the user until it leaves Battle.

fillet away.descEffects: The user sacrifices its health to increase its power. The user takes 4 Wounds of damage. The user's Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed increase by +4 Stages.

flash.descEffects: The user flashes a bright damaging light. Creatures hit by this Move are Blinded until they leave Battle.

focus energy.descEffects: The user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3 until they leave Battle. This ability has no effect if the user is already benefiting from this Move.

follow me.descEffects: The user focuses all attention on themselves. This turn, all Moves used by enemies with a Target Type of Single Target or Contact now target the user. If the user Faints or is Returned before the end of the Round, this effect no longer applies. This Move ignores the Storm Drain and Lightning Rod abilities, allowing the user to be hit by this Move.

foresight.descEffects: The user foils the target's attempts to evade them. Until the target or the user leave Battle, the target does not add any positive Stage changes to defending rolls made to defend from the user's Moves. A Ghost-Type creature affected by this Move loses its immunity to Normal and Fighting-Type Moves.

glare.descEffects: The user transfixes their eyes on the target and intimidates them. The target is Paralyzed.

growl.descEffects: The user gives the target an intimidating leer and lowers their Attack by -2 Stages.

growth.descEffects: The user's body grows all at once. The user's Attack and Sp. Attack increase by +2 Stages. If the Weather is Harsh Sunlight, it increases their Attack and Sp. Attack by +4 instead.

happy hour.descEffects: The user creates additional wealth. At the the end of the Battle, if prize money is exchanged, the winner gains twice as many funds. The user may only use this benefit once per Battle.

harden.descEffects: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body. The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages.

heal bell.descEffects: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of itself, all of its allies, and all creatures its Trainer's party.

helping hand.descEffects: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack. The next Physical or Special Move that the Target before the end of the Round will deal an additional 3 Wounds.

howl.descEffects: The user howls to raise the spirits of its allies. Ally creatures (including the user) have their Attack increased by +2 Stages.

lazer focus.descEffects: The user concentrates intensely. The user's next Move will hit without fail, requiring no roll, and will result in a Critical Hit.

leer.descEffects: The user gives the target an intimidating leer and lowers their Defense by -2 Stages.

lock-on.descEffects: The user takes sure aim at the target. The user's next Move against that target will hit without fail, requiring no roll. If the user or the target leaves Battle, this effect ends.

lovely kiss.descEffects: The user forces a kiss on the target with a scary face. The target falls Asleep.

lucky chant.descEffects: The user chants an incantation at the sky. For 5 Rounds, enemy creatures cannot land Critical Hits.

me first.descEffects: The user cuts ahead of the foe to use one of their Moves with greater power. The user uses one of the Target's Physical or Special Moves (chosen at random). On a hit, that Move deals and additional 2 Wounds. IF this Move targets a creature that has already taken its Turn, this Move fails.

mean look.descEffects: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to Flee or Swap until they or the user Faints or until the Battle Ends.

metronome.descEffects: The user waggles their finger and stimulates their brain for random power. The user uses a randomly chosen Move.

milk drink.descEffects: The user drinks milk to restore itself. The user regains 5 Wounds.

mimic.descEffects: The user copies the Move most recently used by the target of this Move. The user forgets this Move and learns the copied Move until they leave Battle.

mind reader.descEffects: The user senses the target's movements with its mind. The user's next Move against that target will hit without fail, requiring no roll. If the user or the target leaves Battle, this effect ends.

minimize.descEffects: The user compresses itself to make it harder to hit. The user's HP, Defense, and Sp. Defense increase by +2 Stages.

morning sun.descEffects: The user gathers light to heal themself. The user regains 3 Wounds. If the Weather is Harsh Sunlight, the user instead regains 5 Wounds. If the Weather is not clear or Harsh Sunlight, they instead regain 1 Wound.

nature power.descEffects: The user attacks with natures power. Its effects vary depending on the users environment. (Use this Page to determine the Move)

noble roar.descEffects: The user lets out a noble roar, intimidating their foes. Creatures hit by this Move have their Attack and Sp. Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

odor sleuth.descEffects: The user smells to detect the target. Until the target or the user leave Battle, the user ignores all penalties to their attacking rolls and bonuses to the target's defending rolls when using Moves that hit the target. The target loses any Immunities to Fighting-type and Normal-type moves until the leave Battle.

pain split.descEffects: The user removes all Wounds from themself and the target, then adds them together and evenly distributes them between both creatures.

perish song.descEffects: The user sings a malevolent melody that will cause the doom of all who hear it. Each creature in Battle, including the user, receives a Perish Count until the leave Battle. the Perish Count begins at 4. At the end of each Round, the Perish Count goes down by 1. When the Perish Count hits 0, all affected creatures Faint.

play nice.descEffects: The user and the target become friends, forcing the target ot give up the will to fight. The target's Attack lowers by -2 Stages.

power shift.descEffects: The user swaps its offensive and defensive stats. The user's Attack Die and Sp. Attack Die swap sizes with the user's Defense Die and Sp. Defense Die, respectively, until the user leaves Battle.

protect.descEffects: The user completely protects themselves and creatures within 1 Sq. of them. Creatures within the Protect cannot be affected by Moves used by other creatures until the end of the turn. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

psych up.descEffects: The user copies the foe's power by hypnotizing itself. The user's Stages all become 0. The user then copies all Stage changes that the target has.

recover.descEffects: The user restores their own cells, regaining 5 Wounds.

recycle.descEffects: The user recycles an item that they've already used. The user regains a Consumable Held Item that they used early this Battle. If the user is holding a Held Item or the user has not consumed a Held Item this Battle, this Move fails.

reflect type.descEffects: The user reflects the target's power in their own. The user's Type becomes the same as the target's Type until they leave Battle. If the target has no Type, this Move fails.

refresh.descEffects: The user cures itself. The user removes the Burned, Paralyzed , Poisoned, and Badly Poisoned, conditions from itself.

revival blessing.descEffects: The user bestows a lovely blessing. The user targets a Fainted creature in the user's Party and causes it to regain 5 Wounds. The target loses the Fainted condition. If there are no Fainted creatures in the user's Party, this Move fails.

roar.descEffects: The user sings a soothing song that spreads across the field. Creatures hit by this move fall Asleep.

safeguard.descEffects: The user creates a mystical force that protects their allies. For 5 Rounds, the user and its allies cannot be Asleep, Burned, Confused, Frozen, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Badly Poisoned.

scary face.descEffects: The user frightens their targets with a terrifying face. The target's Speed lowers by -4 Stages.

screech.descEffects: The user releases an ear-splitting screech. Creatures hit by this Move have their Defense lowered by -4 Stages.

sharpen.descEffects: The user makes its edges more jagged. The user's Attack increases by +2 Stages.

shed tail.descEffects: The user creates a Decoy copy of itself and Swaps out. If there are no creatures to Swap with, this Move fails. If another creature would hit the swapped creature with a Move, it is instead used on the Decoy. When this Move is used, the user takes 3 Wounds as damage, and this Move will fail if that damage would Faint the user. Once the Decoy has take 3 Wounds worth of damage, been affected by three Moves, or the Battle Ends, the Decoy disappears. Attack rolls made to attack the Decoy automatically succeed. The Decoy is not a living entity and has no stats of its own. The swapped creature cannot gain status conditions (such as Burned, Paralyzed, Flinched) while the Substitute is active.

shell smash.descEffects: The user breaks its shell to increase its offensive power at a cost. The user's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages. The user's Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed increase by +4 Stages.

simple beam.descEffects: The user emits a mysterious psychic wavelength. Creatures hit by this Move lose their Ability and gain the Simple Ability.

sing.descEffects: The user sings a soothing song that spreads across the field. Creatures hit by this move fall Asleep.

sketch.descEffects: The user breaks its shell to increase its offensive power at a cost. The user's HP, Defense and Sp. Defense lower by -2 Stages. The user's Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed increases by +4 Stages.

slack off.descEffects: The user slacks off, regaining 5 Wounds.

sleep talk.descEffects: The user uses one of its other Moves, chosen at random. This Move may be used while the user is Asleep, and fails if it is not Asleep.

smokescreen.descEffects: The user cloaks the area around them in a heavy smoke that lasts 1d4 turns. That area is Heavily Obscured.

soft-boiled.descEffects: The user eats an egg and recovers 5 Wounds worth of damage.

splash.descEffects: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

spotlight.descEffects: The user shines a light on the target, forcing them to be the center of attention. This turn, all Moves used by enemies with a Target Type of Single Target or Contact now target the target of this Move. If the target leaves Battle before the end of the Round, this effect no longer applies. This Move ignores the Storm Drain and Lightning Rod abilities, allowing the target to be hit by this Move.

stockpile.descEffects: The user charges up power inside of themself. The user gains 1 Stockpile stack. A Stockpile stack gives the user a +2 bonus to their defending rolls. A creature may have a maximum of 3 Stockpile stacks at a time. When a creature leaves Battle, they lose all Stockpile stacks. If this Move is used while the user has 3 Stockpile stacks, this Move fails.

stuff cheeks.descEffects: The user eats its food. The user consumes its Held Item. The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages. If the user is not holding a Berry, or this Move fails.

substitute.descEffects: The user creates a Decoy copy of itself. If another creature would hit the user with a Move, it is instead used on the Decoy. When this Move is used, the user takes 3 Wounds as damage, and this Move will fail if that damage would Faint the user. Once the Decoy has take 3 Wounds worth of damage, been affected by three Moves, or the Battle Ends, the Decoy disappears. Attack rolls made to attack the Decoy automatically succeed. The Decoy is not a living entity and has no stats of its own. The user cannot gain status conditions (such as Burned, Paralyzed, Flinched) while the Substitute is active.

supersonic.descEffects: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. Creatures hit by this Move may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

swagger.descEffects: The user begins to hurl insults to infuriate the target. The target becomes Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds and has their Attack increased by +4 Stages.

sweet scent.descEffects: The user releases a breeze of sweet-smelling air that grants the creature hit by it a Disadvantage to their defensive rolls until they leave Battle. Creatures already under the effect of this Move are immune to this Move.

swords dance.descEffects: The user begins a frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit and increases the users Attack by +4 Stages.

tail whip.descEffects: The user wags its tail cutely at the target, making its foe lower its guard. A Pokemon hit by this Move has their Defense Die size reduced by -2 until Fainted, Returned, or Battle End.

tearful look.descEffects: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. The target's Attack and Sp. Attack lower by -2 Stages.

teatime.descEffects: The user holds a tea time with all creatures in Battle. All creatures in Battle consume their Held Item if it is a Berry.

teeter dance.descEffects: The user performs a wobbly dance. Creatures hit by this Move are Confused for 1d4 +1 Rounds.

tickle.descEffects: The user tickles the target into laughing. The target's Attack and Defense lower by -2 Stages.

tidy up.descEffects: The user tidies up. The user's Attack and Speed increase by +2 Stages. All Hazards are removed from the field.

transform.descEffects: The user transforms into the target until the user leaves Battle. The user replaces their Species, Nature, Stat Dice sizes, Size Category, Type, Ability, Stage Changes, and Gender. The user also replaces their Moves with the target's Moves, but the copied Moves only have 1 PP each.

whirlwind.descEffects: The user blows the target away, forcing them to Swap. If there are no creatures to Swap with, this Move fails. If the Move is used on a Wild Pokemon, that Pokemon Flees. Moves that would prevent the target from being effected by this Move, such as Protect, do not prevent the target from being affected by this Move.

wish.descEffects: The user releases its energy as a wish to the universe. At the beginning of the next Priority Phase, the user regains 6 Wounds. If the user has Swapped with another creature, that creature instead regains 6 Wounds.

work up.descEffects: The user rouses themselves. The user's Attack and Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

yawn.descEffects: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into drowsiness for a two-turn effect. The target gains the special 'Eepy' condition. While Drowsy, a creature has a disadvantage on their Stat Die rolls. When a Drowsy creature ends their turn, they lose the Drowsy condition and fall Asleep until the end of the next Round. This Move fails if the target is already Drowsy or Asleep.

barb barrage.descEffects: The user launches toxic barbs to inflict damage. The target may be Poisoned. If the target is Asleep, Burned, Paralyzed, Poisoned,or Badly Poisoned, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

cross poison.descEffects: The user slashes with a toxic blade. The target may be Poisoned. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

dire claw.descEffects: The user lashes out with ruinous claws. The target may may develop one of the following status conditions (chosen at random): Asleep, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

gunk shot.descEffects: The user shoots filthy garbage as ammunition. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

mortal spin.descEffects: The user performs a spin attack at target. This Move removes all Hazards from the field, the Bound status condition from the user, and ends the effects of the following Moves: Leech Seed, Snap Trap, and Wrap

noxious torque.descEffects: The user increases their inner torque and spins around. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

poison fang.descEffects: The user bites the target with cold-infused fangs. The target may be Poisoned and/or Flinched.

poison jab.descEffects: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. The target may be Poisoned.

poison sting.descEffects: The user stabs forward a limb infused with poison.The target may be Poisoned.

poison tail.descEffects: The user hits the target with its poisoned tail. The target may be Poisoned. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

acid.descEffects: The user sprays forth a harsh acid. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned. If a creature is Poisoned this way, their Defense is reduced by -2 Stages.

acid spray.descEffects: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. The target's HP and Sp. Defense lower by -4 Stages.

belch.descEffects: The user lets out a damaging belch. This Move fails if the user has not eaten a Berry since entering Battle.

clear smog.descEffects: The user throws a clump of special mud at a 1 Sq. radius spot within range. Creatures hit by this Move have their Stages set to 0.

malignant chain.descEffects: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. The target may be Badly Poisoned.

shell side arm.descEffects: The user attacks with their powerful poisonous shell. The target may be Poisoned. If the user's Attack Die size is larger than the user's Sp. Attack Die size, this Move is a Physical Move instead of a Special Move.

sludge.descEffects: The user hurls unsanitary sludge. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

sludge bomb.descEffects: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at a point within range, enveloping each creature within a 2 Sq. radius of that point. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

sludge wave.descEffects: The user swamps the area around itself with a thick poison. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

smog.descEffects: The user releases a discharge of filthy gases in an area around it. Creatures hit by this Move may be Poisoned.

venoshock.descEffects: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. The Move deals twice as many Wounds if the target is Poisoned.

acid armor.descEffects: The user alters its cellular structure to protect itself. The user's HP and Defense increase by +4 Stages.

baneful bunker.descEffects: The user protects themselves in a shroud of poison. They cannot be affected by Moves used by other creatures until the end of the turn, and if a creature uses a Contact Move on them while shrouded, they are Poisoned. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

coil.descEffects: The user coils up an concentrates. The user's Attack and Defense increase by +2 Stages.

corrosive gas.descEffects: The user sprays a highly acidic gas. Creatures hit by this Move have their Held Items removed until the Battle Ends. Held Items removed this way cannot be regained through Recycle or Harvest.

gastro acid.descEffects: The user hurls up its stomach acid. Creatures hit by this Move lose their Ability until they leave Battle.

poison gas.descEffects: The user sprays forth a cloud of poisonous gas. Creatures hit by this Move are Poisoned.

poison powder.descEffects: The user releases a cloud of poisonous dust. Creatures hit by this Move are Poisoned.

purify.descEffects: The user heals the target. The target loses all of the following status conditions: Asleep, Burned, Paralyzed, Poisoned, and Badly Poisoned. The user regains 5 Wounds. If the target does not have one of those status conditions, this Move fails.

toxic.descEffects: The user spits a viscous poison to rain over a point within range, covering each creature within a 2 Sq. radius of that point. Creatures hit by this Move are Badly Poisoned.

toxic spikes.descEffects: The user scatters poisonous spikes over the field. Enemy creatures that enter Battle while the spikes are present are Poisoned. If this Move is used a second time while the original Toxic Spikes are still present, creatures will instead be Badly Poisoned if affected by this Move. Additional uses of this Move beyond the second grant no additional benefit.

toxic thread.descEffects: The user fires poisonous threads at the target. The target is Poisoned. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages.

venom drench.descEffects: The user drenches the field in a reactive venom. Each creature that is Poisoned or Badly Poisoned has their Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

heart stamp.descEffects: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. The target may be Flinched.

psyblade.descEffects: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. When an Electric Terrain is active, this Move deals an additional 2 Wounds

psychic fangs.descEffects: The user bites the target with psychic capabilites. Before calculating damage, this move ends all barriers from the target's side of the field, such a Aurora Veil, Light Screen, and Reflect.

psycho cut.descEffects: The user tears at the target with blades made of psychic power. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

psyshield bash.descEffects: The user cloaks itself in psychic energy and slams into the target. The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages.

zen headbutt.descEffects: The user focuses their willpower to its head and rams its target. The target may be Flinched.

confusion.descEffects: The user manifests a weak telekinetic force. This Move may Confuse the target for 1d4 + 1.

dream eater.descEffects: The user selects a target that is Asleep and in range. The user consumes the target's dreams, dealing damage to them and regaining an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1). This Move fails is it targets a creature that is not Asleep.

eerie spell.descEffects: The user attacks with tremendous psychic power. Creature hit by this Move have 1 PP removed from the Move that they used last.

esper wing.descEffects: The user slashes with aura-enriched wings. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

expanding force.descEffects: The user attacks with psychic power. When a Psychic Terrain is active, this Move deals an additional 3 Wounds.

extrasensory.descEffects: The user attacks with an odd unseeable power. The target my be Flinched.

freezing glare.descEffects: The user shoots psychic power from its eyes to attack. The target may be Frozen.

future sight.descEffects: The user sends a pulse of psychic energy into the future against the target. In two Rounds, at the end of the Round, this Move is used against the target. If the target has Swapped with another creature, that creature instead becomes the new target. This attack is still made, even if the user is no longer in Battle.

glitzy glow.descEffects: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. The user uses Light Screen.

hyperspace hole.descEffects: The user creates a hyperspace hole and uses it to appear by the target, striking it. The user moves to the target, no additional movement required. This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

lumina crash.descEffects: The user unleashes a peculiar light that affects the mind. Creatures hit by this Move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -4 Stages.

luster purge.descEffects: The user looses a burst of damaging light. Creatures hit by this Move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

mirror coat.descEffects: The user gathers the energy of a Special Move that has hit them this round and counters it, sending it back as a flash of energy at the Pokemon that attacked them. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to twice the Wounds that the Special Move dealt, not adding or subtracting any additional damage (such as S.T.A.B., Resistance, etc.). If the attacking Pokemon is no longer in Battle, or if the user has not been hit by a Special Move this Round, this Move fails. If this Pokemon was hit by a Special Move that delivers multiple hits, it only considers the damage from the first hit.

mist ball.descEffects: The user sends a mist-like flurry of down forward.  Creatures hit by this Move have their Sp. Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

mystical power.descEffects: The user emits a mysterious power that strengthens itself. The user's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages.

photon geyser.descEffects: The user attacks with a pillar of light. This Move ignores all Abilities that would affect it. If the user's Attack Die size is larger than the user's Sp. Attack Die size, this Move is a Physical Move instead of a Special Move.

prismatic laser.descEffects: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

psybeam.descEffects: The user sends a peculiar ray of light forward. Creatures hit by this Move may be Confused for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

psychic.descEffects: The user manifests a massive telekinetic force and strikes the target. The target's Sp. Defense may lower by -2 Stages.

psychic noise.descEffects: The user attacks with unpleasant sound waves. Creatures hit by this Move cannot regain Wounds for 2 Rounds, or until the leave Battle.

psycho boost.descEffects: The user attacks with its full power. The user's Sp. Attack lowers by -4 Stages.

psyshock.descEffects: The user releases an odd psychic wave to attack. When making the defending roll for this Move, creatures must use their Defense Stat Die, rather than their Sp. Defense Stat Die.

psystrike.descEffects: The user materializes an odd psychic wave.  When making the defending roll for this Move, use the target's Defense Die for the roll, rather than the target's Sp. Defense Die.

psywave.descEffects: The user attacks with a hot, variable energy wave. This Move deals 1d4 - 1 (minimum of 1) Wound on a hit.

stored power.descEffects: The user releases its built-up energy. This Move deals an additional number of Wounds equal to half of the sum of the user's Stages (minimum 0).

synchronoise.descEffects: The user creates an odd shock wave that only damages creatures that share a Type with it.

twin beam.descEffects: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage at up to two targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

agility.descEffects: The user relaxes and lightens their body. The user's Speed increased by +4 Stages.

ally switch.descEffects: The user designates an Ally for the Round. The next time before that Ally would be hit by a Move, the user and the Ally swap positions, treating the user as the new target for the attack. Reroll the attacking and defending roll to determine if the user of this Move is hit.

amnesia.descEffects: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. The user's Sp. Defense increases by +4 Stages.

barrier.descEffects: The user creates a psychic shield around themself that increases their Defense by +2 Stages.

calm mind.descEffects: The user concentrates inward. The user's Sp. Attack and Sp. Defense increase by +2 Stages.

cosmic power.descEffects: The user absorbs the mystical power of space. The user's HP, Defense, and Sp. Defense increase by +2 Stages.

gravity.descEffects: The user heavily intensifies gravity over the field for 5 Rounds. All creatures lose their flying and levitating speeds, and they lose their immunity to Ground-Type Moves. All Moves gain an Advantage to their attacking rolls. All of the following Moves are cancelled and cannot be used: Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash and Telekinesis.

guard split.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to average the defensive abilities of the user and the target. Add together the die sizes of the user and the targets HP, Defense, and Sp. Defense, then average them (d4= 1, d6 = 2, etc...). The HP, Defense, and Sp. Defense of the user and the target all become the average until they leave Battle.

guard swap.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to switch defensive empowerments with the target. The user and the target swap the Stage changes of their HP, Defense and Sp. Defense.

heal block.descEffects: The user creates a psychic field that impedes healing for 5 Rounds. Enemy creatures cannot regain Wounds while in Battle.

heal pulse.descEffects: The user emits a pulse of healing energy causes another ally creature to regain 5 Wounds.

healing wish.descEffects: The user gives it life-force for its ally. The user Faints. At the end of the Round, another creature in its Party enters Battle. That creature regains all Wounds and is cured of all status conditions. If there are no non-Fainted creatures in the user's Party, this Move fails.

heart swap.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to swap empowerments with the target. The user and the target swap all Stage changes.

hypnosis.descEffects: The user employs hypnotic suggestions to make the target fall Asleep. If this ability is used outside of battle, the Pokemon remains Asleep until it is actively awakened by another source.

imprison.descEffects: The user creates a psychic knowledge block over the field until the user leaves Battle. Enemy creatures cannot use Moves known by the user.

instruct.descEffects: The user instructs the target to use its Move again. The target immediately uses the Move it used last. If the target has not taken their Turn yet this Round, this Move fails.

kinesis.descEffects: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. The target's Attack and Sp. Attack lower by -2 Stages.

light screen.descEffects: The user creates a self-sustaining barrier that protects itself and its allies for 5 Turns. During this time, whenever the user or an ally creature would take Wounds from a Special Move, they instead take half as many Wounds (rounded up).

lunar blessing.descEffects: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon. Ally creatures, including the user, are cured of all status conditions and regain 3 Wounds.

lunar dance.descEffects: The user gives it life-force for its ally. The user Faints. At the end of the Round, another creature in its Party enters Battle. That creature regains all Wounds, is cured of all status conditions, and regains all PP. If there are no non-Fainted creatures in the user's Party, this Move fails.

magic coat.descEffects: The user instinctively protects itself from Status Moves. If the user would be hit by a Status Move, and the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move and take their Turn. The user of this Move then immediately uses the triggering Status Move on its original user. New attacking and defending rolls are made for that Move.

magic powder.descEffects: The user scatters magic powder on the target. The target's Type becomes Psychic-Type until the target leaves Battle.

magic room.descEffects: The user creates a bizarre area in which Held Items do not work for 5 Rounds. Creatures receive no benefit from their Held Items, and Held Items cannot be used of consumed. This effect does not begin until the beginning of the Priority Phase after this Move is used. This effect does not inhibit Mega Evolution.

meditate.descEffects: The user meditates to awaken power. The user's Attack increases by +2 Stages.

miracle eye.descEffects: The user opens its mind's eye to the void. Until the target or the user leave Battle, the target does not add any positive Stage changes to defending rolls made to defend from the user's Moves. A Dark-Type creature affected by this Move loses its immunity to Psychic-Type Moves.

power split.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to average the offensive abilities of the user and the target. Add together the die sizes of the user and the targets Attack and Sp. Attack, then average them (d4= 1, d6 = 2, etc...). The Attack and Sp. Attack of the user and the target all become the average until they leave Battle.

power swap.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to switch offensive empowerments with the target. The user and the target swap the Stage changes of their Attack and Sp. Attack.

power trick.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to switch the user's Attack Die Size with the user's Defense Die Size until it leaves Battle.

psychic terrain.descEffects: The user saturates the ground under their feet with psionic energy and creates a Psychic Terrain for 5 Rounds.

psycho shift.descEffects: The user employs the power of suggestion to transfer its weakness to the target. The user is cured of up to one status condition from the following: Asleep, Burned, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Badly Poisoned. The target gains the status condition that the user is cured of.

reflect.descEffects: The user creates a self-sustaining barrier that protects itself and its allies for 5 Turns. During this time, whenever the user or an ally creature would take Wounds from a Physical Move, they instead take half as many Wounds (rounded up).

rest.descEffects: The user falls Asleep for two Rounds, but regains all Wound damage.

role play.descEffects: The user loses its Ability and replaces it with the Ability of the target. If this Move is used on a creature with Wonder Guard or Mulititype, this Move fails.

skill swap.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to swap Abilities with the target. If an Ability gained this way would activate when a creature would enter Battle, it activates immediately.

speed swap.descEffects: The user employs its psychic power to switch speed with the target. The user and the target swap Turn Order. If a creature has already taken their Turn this Round, they cannot gain another Turn through this Move.

take heart.descEffects: The user lifts its spirits. The user is cured of all status conditions. The user's Sp. Attack and Sp. Defense increase by +2 Stages.

telekinesis.descEffects: The user floats the target into the air and makes them helpless to any form of attack. For 1d4 + 1 Turns, Moves that target that creature hit without fail, requiring no roll, and the target has their Movement Speed become 0. Creatures affected by this Move cannot have their Movement Speed increased. The target gains an immunity to Ground-Type Moves while affected by this Move. This Move hits without fail, requiring no roll.

teleport.descEffects: The user immediately teleports itself out of Battle, ignoring any restrictions to Swapping, Returning, or Fleeing. When this Move is used, the user chooses to Swap or Flee. If they Flee, it does not require a roll. Outside of Battle, the user can designate a number of Locations equal to half of its Rank, rounded down (minimum 1), that the user has been to before. This creature can expend all remaining uses of this Move (minimum) to teleport itself and a number of creatures equal to its Rank to that location. To designate a Location, the user must have spent one minute in that location, imprinting into its mind.

trick.descEffects: The user and the target swap Held Items until the Battle ends. If only one of those creatures has a Held Item, it is moved to the other. If neither creatures has a Held Item, this Move fails.

trick room.descEffects: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokemon get to move first for 5 Rounds. Turn Order resolves in the opposite order, beginning with the lowest Turn Order and ending with the highest. The Priority Phase is still resolved before non-Priority Moves, but creatures resolve their Turns in reverse order. This effect does not begin until the beginning of the Priority Phase after this Move is used.

wonder room.descEffects: The user creates a bizarre area in which the defensive abilities of creatures are swapped for 5 Rounds. Each creature's Defense Die size swaps with that creature's Sp. Defense Die size. When this Move ends, those Die sizes return to their original sizes.

accelerock.descEffects: The user smashes into the target at high speed.

diamond storm.descEffects: The user whips up a storm of diamonds that targets only enemy creatures. For each creature that this Move hits, there is a 50% chance that the user's Defense increases by +4 Stages.

head smash.descEffects: The user delivers a life-endangering attack at full power. This Move deals Recoil damage.

mighty cleave.descEffects: The user wields the light accumulated atop its head to cleave around it. This Move can hit creatures protected by 'protection Moves', such as Protect.

rock blast.descEffects: The user hurls hard rocks at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

rock slide.descEffects: The user hurls large boulders at a spot within range, slamming them into all creatures within a 3 Sq. radius. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched.

rock throw.descEffects: The user picks up a small rock and throws it at the target.

rock tomb.descEffects: The user hurls a cascade of rocks at a point within range, burying all creatures within a 2 Sq. radius. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Speed reduced by -2 Stages.

rock wrecker.descEffects: The user launches a huge boulder at a 1 Sq. radius spot within range. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

rollout.descEffects: The user tucks itself into a ball and begins to roll for 5 Rounds. Each turn, without expending an additional PP, the user strikes at a target within range, dealing an additional Wound for each previous time this Move has hit since the user began rolling. If the user cannot hit a target, misses a target, or leaves Battle, this Move ends early. If the user is under the effects of Defense Curl, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

salt cure.descEffects: The user salt cures the target, drying them out and corroding them. The target is 'salt cured' until the leave Battle. A salt cured creature takes 1 Wound of damage at the end of each Round. If that creature is a Steel- or Water-Type, it instead takes 2 Wounds at the end of each Round.

smack down.descEffects: The user throws a projectile at a target. A Pokemon hit by this Move loses flying and levitating Movement Speeds, and they lose any immunity to Ground Type Moves until they leave Battle.

stone axe.descEffects: The user swings its stone axes forward. The user uses Stealth Rock.

stone edge.descEffects: The user causes a spire of rock to stab upward at a point within range, impaling all creatures within a 2 Sq. radius. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

ancient power.descEffects: The user lifts portions of the field with its prehistoric power and bombards hurls it at a point within range, striking creature within a 2 Sq. radius. There is a 25% chance that the user's Stats increase by +2 Stages.

meteor beam.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, the user gathers the overwhelming power of space. The user's Sp. Attack increases by +2 Stages. On the second Turn, the user fires that energy as a beam. If the user is unable to use their second turn to attack due to being interrupted (such as by being Asleep, Frozen, or Flinched), the user will still attack at full power on the next available turn, no additional PP required.

power gem.descEffects: The user blasts a beam of light the glitters as if it were made of gemstones.

rock polish.descEffects: The user smooths their body. The user's Speed increases by +4 Stages.

stealth rock.descEffects: The user scatters sharp rocks across the field. Whenever an enemy Pokemon enters Battle while these rocks are present, that Pokemon takes 2 Wounds, though this Status Move is affected by Type Effectiveness. Additional uses of this Move beyond the first grant no additional benefit.

tar shot.descEffects: The user pours sticky tar over the target. The target's Speed lowers by -2 Stages and the target becomes 'tar covered'. A 'tar covered' creature takes twice as many Wounds from Fire-Type Physical and Special Moves until the target leave's battle.

wide guard.descEffects: The user and its allies are protected until the end of the turn from all Moves that do not have a Target Type of Single Target or Self. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

anchor shot.descEffects: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain. The target cannot Swap or Flee without the use of an Ability, Item, or Move until the user leaves Battle.

behemoth bash.descEffects: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. If the user is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

behemoth blade.descEffects: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts into the target. If the user is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

bullet punch.descEffects: The user strikes the target with a tough punch as fast as a bullet.

double iron bash.descEffects: The user rotates and strikes out with its arms twice in a row. This Move causes the user to attack its surroundings twice. Creatures hit by this Move may be Flinched after each hit. Each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

gear grind.descEffects: The user throws steel gears from its body at up to two targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

gigaton hammer.descEffects: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This Move cannot be used two Turns in a row by the user.

gyro ball.descEffects: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to twice the difference the size of the target's Speed Die Size minus the user's Speed Die Size (minimum of 1). For example, if the user has a d4 Speed Die Size (Size 1), and the target's is a d20 (Size 6), this Move deals (6 - 1) * 2 = 10 Wounds.

hard press.descEffects: The user crushes the target with an arm, claw, or similar body part. This Move deals one fewer Wound for each Wound that the user has (minimum 1).

heavy slam.descEffects: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to twice the difference of the Size categories of the user and the target (minimum 1). To calculate the value of each Size category, refer to the following: 1 (Small), 2 (Medium), 3 (Large), 4 (Huge), 5 (Massive). If the target has used Minimize, this Move hits without fail, requiring no roll, and deals twice the number of Wounds.

iron head.descEffects: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. The target may be Flinched.

iron tail.descEffects: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This Move may lower the target's Defense by -2 Stages.

magnet bomb.descEffects: The user launches a steel homing bomb that sticks to the target.

metal burst.descEffects: The user retaliates against the targets with pieces of metal shrapnel. This Move deals a number of Wounds equal to the most damage that the user received from the target from a single Move + 2 Wounds. If the user targets a creature that has not used a Physical or Special Move on them this Round, then this Move fails. If this creature has not been hit by a Physical or Special Move this Round, this Move cannot be used.

metal claw.descEffects: The user rakes the target with steel claws. There is a 25% chance that this Move increases the user's Attack by +2 Stages.

meteor mash.descEffects: The user hits with a hard punch fired like a meteor. There is a 25% chance that the user's Attack increases by +2 Stages.

smart strike.descEffects: The user stabs the target with its sharp horn.

spin out.descEffects: The user furiously spins by straining its legs. The user's Speed lowers by -4 Stages.

steel roller.descEffects: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. The Move deals twice as many Wounds if a Terrain is in effect. After this Move is used, the current Terrain ends.

steel wing.descEffects: The user strikes the target with hardened wings. There is a 25% chance that the user's Defense increases by +2 Stages.

sunsteel strike.descEffects: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This Move ignores all Abilities that would affect it.

doom desire.descEffects: The user sends a bundle of light into the future to attack the target. In two Rounds, at the end of the Round, this Move is used against the target. If the target has Swapped with another creature, that creature instead becomes the new target. This attack is still made, even if the user is no longer in Battle.

flash cannon.descEffects: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. Creatures hit by this Move may have their Sp. Defense lowered by -2 Stages.

make it rain.descEffects: The user attacks by throwing a mass of coins. The user's Sp. Attack lowers by -2 Stages. At the end of the Battle, the winner receives a number of PokeDollars equal to 20 x the user's rank. This benefit can only be granted once per day by the user.

mirror shot.descEffects: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. Creatures hit by this Move may be Blinded until they leave Battle.

steel beam.descEffects: The user fires a beam of steel that it has collected from its body. The user takes 4 Wounds of damage.

tachyon cutter.descEffects: The user launches particle blades at up to two targets.  A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

autotomize.descEffects: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages. For the purposes of Moves that deal damage based on Size category, the user is considered one size smaller until the leave Battle.

gear up.descEffects: The user engages its gears to power up its allies. All ally creatures with the Plus or Minus ability, including the user, have their Attack and Sp. Attack increased by +2 Stages.

iron defense.descEffects: The user hardens its body's surface like iron. The user's Defense increases by +4 Stages.

king's shield.descEffects: The user takes a defensive stance that protects the user from all Physical and Special Moves from other creatures until the end of the turn. If this Move blocks a Contact Move, the attackering creature's Attack lowers -4 Stages. This move has a cumulative 25% chance at failing for each of the following Moves the user has used in a row before it: Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Silk Trap, and Spiky Shield. This chance resets once the Move has failed or the user uses a Move not on this list.

metal sound.descEffects: The user emits a horrible screech of scraping metal. Creatures hit by this Move have their Sp. Defense lowered by -4 Stages.

shelter.descEffects: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield. The user's Defense increases by +4 Stages.

shift gear.descEffects: The user rotates its body, making itself more mobile and powerful. The user's Speed increases by +4 Stages. The user's Attack increases by +2 Stages.

aqua cutter.descEffects: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

aqua jet.descEffects: The user lunges forward, propelled by a blast of water. The user may immediately move in a straight line up to their Movement Speed and then strike the target. This movement does not count against their movement for the Turn.

aqua step.descEffects: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. The user's Speed increases by +2 Stages.

aqua tail.descEffects: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

clamp.descEffects: The user clamps down and squeezes the target for 4 or 5 Rounds (chosen randomly). While this Move is in effect, niether the user or the target can use Moves or their movement speed. At the end of each Round, the user takes 1 Wound of damage. If the target Swaps while affected by this Move, the user has not yet taken their Turn, the user may immediately declare the use of this Move against the incoming creature and take their Turn.

crabhammer.descEffects: The user hammers the target with a large pincer. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3.

dive.descEffects: The user performs a two-Turn attack. First, they swim down through either water or earth, entering Full Obscurement. On the second Turn, they leave Full Obscurement and burst out underneath the target. The user of this Move can target any creature in Battle with this Move and moves to the target, requiring no movement. The Moves Surf and Whirlpool ignore the user's Full Obscurement granted by this Move,and they deal twice as many Wounds on a hit.

fishious rend.descEffects: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the target has not yet taken its Turn, this Move deals twice as many Wounds.

flip turn.descEffects: The user rushes to attack the target and then escapes. The user strikes the target, then the user immediately Swaps with another creature in their Party. If there are no other creatures to Swap with, this effect fails. If this Move is used against a Wild Pokemon, the user instead Flees.

jet punch.descEffects: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed.

liquidization.descEffects: The user slams into the target with a full-force blast of water. The target's Defense may be lowered by -2 Stages.

razor shell.descEffects: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This Move may lower the target's Defense by -2 Stages.

surging strikes.descEffects: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion 3 times in a row. Each hit of this Move always results on a Critical Hit upon hitting the target. When using this Move, all attacks must target the same creature.
