If the target Faints before all attacks have been made, this Move ends early. Each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

triple dive.descEffects: The user performs a perfectly times triple dive, hitting up to 3 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

waterfall.descEffects: The user charges at the target by propelling themselves with water. The user may immediately move in a straight line up to their Movement Speed and then strike the target. This movement does not count against their movement for the Turn. The target may be Flinched.

wave crash.descEffects: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body. This Move deals Recoil Damage.

bouncy bubble.descEffects: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. The user regains an amount of Wounds equal to half the damage dealt (rounded down, minimum 1).

brine.descEffects: The user sprays highly acidic water at the target. This Move deals twice as many Wounds if the target has 5 or more Wounds.

bubble.descEffects: The user sprays countless bubbles in a loose cone. Creatures hit by this attack may have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

bubble beam.descEffects: The user sprays a forceful stream of bubbles forward. Creatures hit by this attack may have their Speed lowered by -2 Stages.

chilling water.descEffects: The user sprays a cold shower of weakening water. Creatures hit by this Move have their Attack lowered by -2 Stages.

hydro cannon.descEffects: The user releases a deluge of water. When this Move hits, the user must recharge on their next turn, and cannot carry out Commands, be Swapped or Returned, or use Items.

hydro pump.descEffects: The user blasts forward a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

hydro steam.descEffects: The user blasts the area with boiling hot water. This Move does not have its damage lowered by Harsh Sunlight. Instead, this Move deals an additional 2 Wounds in Harsh Sunlight.

muddy water.descEffects: The user shoots out muddy water. Creatures hit by this Move may be Blinded until they leave Battle.

octazooka.descEffects: The user sprays a dense blast of ink. Creatures hit by this Move may be Blinded until they leave Battle.

origin pulse.descEffects: The user creates countless beams of brilliant blue light that only target enemy creatures.

scald.descEffects: The user shoots forth boiling water. Creatures hit by this Move are thawed from being Frozen and may be Burned.

snipe shot.descEffects: The user fires a precise blast of water at the target. When making an attack with this Move, the user lowers the amount that they need to roll over a defending roll to Critically Hit by 3. This Move ignores the effects of Moves or Abilities that prevent targets, such as Follow Me and Storm Drain.

sparkling aria.descEffects: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Creatures hit by this Move are cured of the Burned status condition.

splishy splash.descEffects: The user charges a wave with electricity. Creatures hit by this Move may be Paralyzed.

steam eruption.descEffects: The user blasts out superheated steam in an explosion. Creatures hit by this Move are cured of the Frozen status condition and may be Burned. If the user is Frozen, they may still declare a use of the Move and end the Frozen condition on themself.

surf.descEffects: The user swamps the area around them with a turbulent wave. This Move deals twice as many Wounds to creatures that are using a Swimming movement speed.

water gun.descEffects: The user squirts a forceful shot of water at the target.

water pledge.descEffects: The user creates a 2 Sq. radius column of raging water within range. If an ally creature uses Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge and the user has not yet taken their turn, the user may skip their Turn this Round, expend one PP from this Move, and have that Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge deal twice as many Wounds. If Fire Pledge is affected this way, a rainbow appears over the field for 2 Rounds that grants ally creatures the Serene Grace ability (in addition to their other abilities). If Grass Pledge is affected this way, a swamp appears on the field for 2 Rounds that quarter's enemy Pokemon's Turn Order (rounded down). If a rainbow, sea of fire, or swamp are already present on the battlefield (by being summoned by a Pledge move), then this Move does not create a rainbow or sea of fire.

water pulse.descEffects: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This Move may Confuse the target for 1d4 + 1 Rounds.

water shuriken.descEffects: The user throws water-made shurikens at up to 1d4 + 1 targets. A single creature can be targeted multiple times, though each successive hit on a single target does not add additional Wounds from S.T.A.B., Items, or Abilities.

water spout.descEffects: The user sends out a massive blast of water. This Move deals one fewer Wound for each Wound that the user has (minimum 1).

whirlpool.descEffects: The user releases violent swirling whirlpools that surround each enemy creature on the Field. Creatures hit by this Move are Bound in an intense spiral of water that rages for 1d4 + 1 turns.

aqua ring.descEffects: The user envelopes itself in a veil of water until they leave Battle. This veil causes the user to regain 1 Wound at the end of each Round.

life dew.descEffects: The user scatters mysterious water around the field. rAlly creatures, including the user, regain 2 Wounds.

rain dance.descEffects: The user summons storm clouds and changes the weather to Rain for 5 turns.

soak.descEffects: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target. The target loses all Types and gains the Water-Type until they leave Battle.

water sport.descEffects: The user soaks themselves and the battlefield with water to protect from heat. Until the user leaves Battle, all Fire-Type Moves deal half as many Wounds (rounded up).

withdraw.descEffects: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell The user's Defense increases by +2 Stages.
